ancestries.name: Human
ancestries.description: Short-lived, fragile, and driven by burning ambition. They possess a grit that allows them to endure when all hope seems lost.

feats.name: Adaptable Learner
feats.effect: Choose one Skill you are not Trained in. You become Trained (d4) in that Skill.

feats.name: Desperate Luck
feats.effect: The first time you would be reduced to 0 HP during a combat, you can spend 1 Luck Point (Free Action) to instead be at 1 HP.

feats.name: Resourceful
feats.effect: Choose one benefit: Gain +4 Max HP, +1 Max Stamina (STA), +2 Max Mana (MP), or +1 Inventory Slot.

feats.name: Silver-Tongued
feats.effect: Advantage on Influence (CHA) Checks made to barter, negotiate prices, or find a buyer for loot.

feats.name: Stubborn Resolve
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist the Frightened condition. The first time you are Frightened in a session, ignore the effects for 1 round.

feats.name: Press the Advantage
feats.effect: When you roll a Natural 20 (Crit) on a Check, you gain BOTH a Bonus Effect AND 1 Luck Point.

ancestries.name: Elf
ancestries.description: Ancient, decadent, and cold. Their long lives make them alien to others. Whether high-minded scholars or subterranean dwellers, they are dangerous.

feats.name: Arcane Resonance
feats.effect: Your Maximum Mana (MP) increases by 2.

feats.name: Keen Senses
feats.effect: You become Trained (d4) in Scrutiny (WIS).

feats.name: Martial Elegance
feats.effect: Gain Proficiency (d4) with Rapiers and Longbows. If already Trained, become Expert (d6).

feats.name: Otherworldly Trance
feats.effect: You do not sleep. You enter a conscious 4-hour trance to gain the benefits of a Long Rest.

feats.name: Unfathomable Mind
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist the Charmed condition or opposed Influence (CHA) checks.

feats.name: Unnatural Grace
feats.effect: Advantage on all Acrobatics (DEX) Checks made to balance, tumble, or escape holds.

ancestries.name: Dwarf
ancestries.description: A folk of stone, gold, and memory. Stubborn and unbreakable, forged by the pressure of the deep earth.

feats.name: Stout Constitution
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist Poisoned. Your Maximum HP increases by 4.

feats.name: Stone-Sense
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Craft & Tinker (INT). Advantage on Scrutiny Checks to spot traps/doors in stone.

feats.name: Dwarven Armor Training
feats.effect: Ignore the Disadvantage on Stealth imposed by wearing Medium Armor.

feats.name: Treasure-Hauler
feats.effect: You gain +2 Inventory Slots.

feats.name: Axe & Hammer Mastery
feats.effect: Gain Proficiency (d4) with Handaxes, Battleaxes, and Warhammers. If already Trained, become Expert (d6).

feats.name: Unbreakable Focus
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist the Confused or Dazed conditions.

ancestries.name: Smallfolk
ancestries.description: Halflings, Gnomes, Pixies. Overlooked, mischievous, and fiercely lucky.

feats.name: Fae-Touched
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist magical spells or the Charmed condition.

feats.name: Halfling's Luck
feats.effect: When you roll a Natural 1 (Whiff), spend 1 Luck Point to re-roll. Must use new result.

feats.name: Inquisitive Mind
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in either Craft & Tinker (INT) or Lore & Knowledge (INT).

feats.name: Mischievous
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Deception (CHA).

feats.name: Naturally Stealthy
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Stealth & Thievery (DEX).

feats.name: Nimble Escape
feats.effect: When you pass a Dodge (DEX) Check, immediately move 5 feet (no counter-attacks).

ancestries.name: Goblin
ancestries.description: Small, cunning survivors. Masters of junk-crafting and dirty fighting.

feats.name: Filth-Eater
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist the Poisoned condition.

feats.name: Goblin Cunning
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Craft & Tinker (INT). When crafting Alchemist or Poisoner Reagents, the Craft DC is reduced by 2.

feats.name: Junk-Tinker
feats.effect: Use Craft & Tinker (INT) to repair a Fragile weapon that has broken (DC 11, 1 Turn).

feats.name: Backstabber
feats.effect: When you make a melee Attack Check against a Flanked enemy, deal +1 damage.

feats.name: Skulker
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Stealth & Thievery (DEX).

feats.name: Wiry Escape
feats.effect: Advantage on any Check made to escape the Grappled condition.

ancestries.name: Orc
ancestries.description: Forged by conflict, valued for violence. Defined by their strength and their scars.

feats.name: Powerful Build
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Athletics (STR).

feats.name: Brute's Endurance
feats.effect: Your Maximum HP increases by 3. Advantage on Checks to resist Exhausted.

feats.name: Brutal Damage
feats.effect: When making a melee attack using STR, re-roll one damage die that results in a 1.

feats.name: Menacing
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Intimidation (CHA).

feats.name: Savage Weapon Training
feats.effect: Gain Proficiency (d4) with Greataxes and Mauls. If Trained, become Expert (d6).

feats.name: Warrior's Blood
feats.effect: Your Maximum Stamina (STA) increases by 1.

ancestries.name: Beastfolk
ancestries.description: Feline, canine, or ursine humanoids. Driven by powerful instincts and primal strength.

feats.name: Natural Weapons
feats.effect: Your Unarmed Strike becomes a Finesse weapon that deals 1d6 damage.

feats.name: Primal Senses
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Scrutiny (WIS). Advantage on Survival Checks to track.

feats.name: Feline Agility
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Acrobatics (DEX). Advantage to reduce fall damage.

feats.name: Ursine Vigor
feats.effect: Your Maximum HP increases by 4. Advantage on Checks to resist Weakened.

feats.name: Wilderness Dweller
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Survival (WIS). Advantage on Stealth in natural environments.

feats.name: Agile Climber
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Athletics (STR). Climb surfaces with handholds without checks.

ancestries.name: Avian
ancestries.description: Bird-like folk of high places. Fast, fragile, and possess an alien perspective.

feats.name: Feather-Light
feats.effect: Advantage on Acrobatics (DEX) to balance/tumble. Take Half Damage from falls.

feats.name: Keen Eyesight
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Scrutiny (WIS).

feats.name: Gliding
feats.effect: If you can spread wings: 0 Damage from falls, move 10ft horizontal for every 10ft descent.

feats.name: Talons
feats.effect: Unarmed Strike deals 1d4 damage and has Finesse and Precise properties.

feats.name: Quickness
feats.effect: Your Base Speed is 35 feet.

feats.name: Omen-Touched
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Deception (CHA).

ancestries.name: Draconid
ancestries.description: People of scale and spite. Innately magical and driven by deep-seated ancestral greed.

feats.name: Elemental Resistance
feats.effect: Choose Fire or Poison. You have Advantage on Checks to resist the Burning or Poisoned condition (matching your choice).

feats.name: Scaly Hide
feats.effect: While Unarmored, you have natural Armor Score (AS) 1. This stacks with a Shield, but not worn armor.

feats.name: Trap-Maker's Cunning
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Craft & Tinker (INT). Advantage on Scrutiny checks to find traps.

feats.name: Draconic Presence
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Intimidation (CHA).

feats.name: Gold-Sense
feats.effect: Advantage on Scrutiny or Investigate checks to find hidden treasure or appraise items.

feats.name: Latent Magic
feats.effect: Your Maximum Mana (MP) increases by 2.

ancestries.name: Plantfolk
ancestries.description: Fungus-folk, dryads, or animated wood. Slow to anger but deep in resolve.

feats.name: Barkskin
feats.effect: Your Maximum HP increases by 4. Advantage on Checks to resist Weakened.

feats.name: Patient Endurance
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist being knocked Prone or moved against your will.

feats.name: Herbalist's Knack
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Craft & Tinker (INT). Herbalism Craft DC reduced by 2.

feats.name: Blinding Spores
feats.effect: Action: 5ft radius cloud. Creatures must pass CON Check (DC 11) or be Blinded 1 round. Recharges on Long Rest.

feats.name: Photosynthesis
feats.effect: No Rations needed. Advantage on Survival checks in forests/jungles.

feats.name: Alien Mind
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist Charmed or Confused.

backgrounds.name: Acolyte
backgrounds.description: You spent your formative years in a temple, monastery, or cult. You know the hierarchy of faith, the smell of sacrificial incense, and the ancient rites that appease the gods. Whether you fled or were sent on a holy mission, your faith is your armor.

feat.name: Divine Sanctuary
feat.effect: You command respect among the faithful. You and your party can receive free healing, food, and shelter at any temple, shrine, or holy site of your faith, provided you do not pose a danger to the clergy.

backgrounds.name: Forbidden Scholar
backgrounds.description: You have read books that drive lesser minds to madness. Your knowledge comes from banned libraries and heretical scrolls locked in deep vaults. You know things about the cosmos that the gods tried to hide, and that knowledge is both a weapon and a burden.

feat.name: Whispers of the Void
feat.effect: Once per session, you can ask the GM for a specific piece of obscure or forbidden lore regarding a monster, artifact, or location. The GM must answer truthfully, though the information may be cryptic.

backgrounds.name: Antiquarian
backgrounds.description: You are obsessed with the past. Ruins are not just piles of stone; they are puzzles waiting to be solved. You can tell the difference between ancient junk and a priceless relic just by the dust on it.

feat.name: Eye for Value
feat.effect: You have Advantage on Intelligence checks to estimate the value of art objects and gems. When selling such items during Downtime, you can negotiate a 10% increase in the sale price.

backgrounds.name: Field Medic
backgrounds.description: You learned your trade in the mud and blood of war. You have sawed off limbs to stop gangrene and stitched guts back together under fire. You aren't a magician; you are a mechanic of the flesh.

feat.name: Triage
feat.effect: As a Standard Action, you can analyze a creature you can see. You learn its current HP, Maximum HP, and any active Physical Conditions (e.g., Poisoned, Bleeding) affecting it.

backgrounds.name: Alchemist's Apprentice
backgrounds.description: You spent your youth grinding reagents, scrubbing cauldrons, and inhaling toxic fumes. You understand the volatile chemistry of the world. You know which mosses explode and which acids dissolve locks.

feat.name: Alchemical Eye
feat.effect: You can identify potions, poisons, and alchemical substances by taste, smell, or observation without making a check. You automatically know the ingredients required to craft them.

backgrounds.name: Artisan
backgrounds.description: You are a maker of things. Whether a blacksmith, mason, or carpenter, you understand how the world is put together. You see the stress lines in a wall and the flaw in a blade before anyone else does.

feat.name: Eye for Craft
feat.effect: You can determine the origin, material quality, and structural weak point of any manufactured object or building by studying it for 1 minute. This grants Advantage on checks to break or dismantle it.

backgrounds.name: Herbalist
backgrounds.description: You lived your life in the wild places, learning the old ways of roots and leaves. You know which berries stop a bleeding wound and which mushrooms stop a heart.

feat.name: Forager's Lore
feat.effect: You automatically identify plants and fungi upon seeing them. You gain Advantage on Survival checks made to harvest flora or find natural food and water.

backgrounds.name: Poisoner
backgrounds.description: You deal in death with a single drop. You might have been an assassin's assistant or a court taster. You understand the crawling, burning, and paralyzing tricks of nature better than anyone.

feat.name: Poisoner's Eye
feat.effect: You can identify a poison's type and origin with a glance. Additionally, you are immune to accidentally poisoning yourself when applying toxins to weapons.

backgrounds.name: Urchin
backgrounds.description: Raised by the cobblestones and the gutter. You were the child no one looked at twice, a ghost in the city learning the secrets of survival in the shadows of the wealthy.

feat.name: Hidden Paths
feat.effect: You move at double speed through urban environments. You can always find a safe, hidden location for the party to take a Short or Long Rest within a city or sewer.

backgrounds.name: Cat Burglar
backgrounds.description: A second-story artist. You don't see walls; you see ladders. You don't see locked doors; you see puzzles. You treat property rights as a suggestion rather than a rule.

feat.name: Case the Joint
feat.effect: If you spend 10 minutes observing a building or location, you can ask the GM one specific question about its security (e.g., guard patrol routes, alarm locations, or entry points) which they must answer truthfully.

backgrounds.name: Smuggler
backgrounds.description: You move things that shouldn't be moved. Whether it's illicit goods, refugees, or forbidden texts, you know the back roads, the bribes, and the secret compartments. You believe laws are just suggestions for people who lack imagination.

feat.name: Hidden Compartment
feat.effect: You have a modified piece of gear (boot heel, false bottom in backpack) that grants 1 Hidden Inventory Slot. Items in this slot cannot be found by a search unless the searcher succeeds on a DC 18 Scrutiny check.

backgrounds.name: Gambler
backgrounds.description: You live by the roll of the die and the turn of a card. You aren't just lucky; you are observant. You know how to calculate odds in a split second and how to spot the nervous twitch of a liar.

feat.name: Read the Tell
feat.effect: After observing or conversing with a creature for 1 minute, you can ask the GM one yes/no question about their current intentions or honesty. The GM must answer truthfully.

backgrounds.name: Sellsword
backgrounds.description: You are a professional killer. Not a hero, not a villain, but a worker whose trade is violence. You understand contracts, chain of command, and that loyalty belongs to the highest bidder.

feat.name: Mercenary's Reputation
feat.effect: You know the signs and codes of the criminal underworld and military organizations. You gain Advantage on Influence checks to gather information or secure meetings with local gangs or guards.

backgrounds.name: Gladiator
backgrounds.description: You survived the pits. Whether you fought for freedom or glory, you learned that combat is a performance. You know how to play to the crowd and how to spot the weakness in an opponent's stance.

feat.name: Size Up
feat.effect: As a Standard Action, you can observe a creature. The GM tells you if their Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution scores are higher, lower, or equal to yours.

backgrounds.name: City Watch
backgrounds.description: A former officer of the law. You have walked the beat, broken up brawls, and taken bribes. You have a cynical eye for trouble and know exactly how to apply pressure to make a suspect talk.

feat.name: Voice of Authority
feat.effect: You have Advantage on Intimidation checks against commoners and criminals. You can often secure passage through city gates or checkpoints by flashing your old badge or invoking the law.

backgrounds.name: Deserter
backgrounds.description: You fled the war when the cause turned sour or the slaughter became too much. You learned to live off the land while looking over your shoulder, identifying threats before they find you.

feat.name: Lie Low
feat.effect: You have Advantage on Survival checks to find hidden campsites or safe paths through wilderness that avoid patrols. You know how to disappear when the heat is on.

backgrounds.name: Courtier
backgrounds.description: A creature of the court, thriving in a jungle of silk and poison. You know that a whispered word can kill faster than a knife. You understand the complex dance of etiquette, lineage, and leverage.

feat.name: Courtly Graces
feat.effect: You have Advantage on Influence checks in formal settings or when dealing with high society. You can usually secure an invitation to social events or balls where information is traded.

backgrounds.name: Exiled Noble
backgrounds.description: Born to privilege but stripped of your lands. You may have lost your fortune, but you kept your education and your name. You carry yourself with an authority that demands respect, even in rags.

feat.name: Noble Bearing
feat.effect: You have Advantage on Influence checks when dealing with nobility, bureaucrats, or officers. You can demand an audience with local rulers, though they may not grant your requests.

backgrounds.name: Charlatan
backgrounds.description: A snake-oil salesman or false prophet. You understand that people want to believe in miracles, and you are happy to sell them one. You are an expert at forging documents and identities.

feat.name: False Identity
feat.effect: You have an established alter ego with documentation. You have Advantage on Deception checks to maintain this persona. You can forge simple documents (travel papers, letters) with 1 hour of work.

backgrounds.name: Escaped Cultist
backgrounds.description: You served a dark power until you saw behind the curtain and fled. You are branded by your past, but you know the signs of the deep entities. You know the secret handshakes and the madness in the eyes of the faithful.

feat.name: Dark Whispers
feat.effect: You have Advantage on checks to identify cult symbols, rituals, or the influence of aberrations. You can often pass as a member of a dark order to gather information without raising suspicion.

archetypes.name: The Soldier
archetypes.description: The disciplined core of any party. A tactical lynchpin who wins through superior technique, armor mastery, and battlefield command.

talents.name: Mastery: Blade Technique
talents.description: Refining the art of the sword through rigorous drill.

ranks.name: Precise Strike
ranks.effect: Trigger: When you hit with a weapon attack. Effect: Add your Proficiency Die to the damage roll.

ranks.name: Keen Edge
ranks.effect: You score a Critical Hit on a roll of 19 or 20 with melee weapons.

ranks.name: Perfect Form
ranks.effect: Trigger: You miss a melee attack. Effect: Re-roll the Attack Check with Advantage. You must use the new result.

talents.name: Mastery: Ironclad
talents.description: Conditioning the body to wear heavy steel as a second skin.

ranks.name: Armor Training
ranks.effect: You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armor. You ignore the CON +2 requirement (you must still meet STR requirement).

ranks.name: Deflect
ranks.effect: Trigger: You take Physical Damage. Effect: Angle your armor to deflect the blow. Reduce damage by 1d8 + CON Modifier.

ranks.name: Adamantine Stance
ranks.effect: While wearing Heavy Armor, you are Immune to Critical Hits (they become normal hits).

talents.name: Mastery: Phalanx
talents.description: Fighting in formation to protect those beside you.

ranks.name: Shield Brother
ranks.effect: If you are adjacent to an ally, both you and the ally gain a +1 Bonus to Defense Checks.

ranks.name: Covering Stance
ranks.effect: Until the start of your next turn, you provide Half Cover (+2 Defense) to all adjacent allies.

ranks.name: Testudo
ranks.effect: Trigger: An adjacent ally is targeted by an Area of Effect (AoE) attack. Effect: You block the blast. The ally takes 0 Damage.

talents.name: Mastery: Tactician
talents.description: Reading the battlefield to exploit enemy mistakes.

ranks.name: Feint
ranks.effect: Make an INT vs Will check against an enemy within 30ft. Success: Your next attack against them has Advantage.

ranks.name: Assess Weakness
ranks.effect: You can use your INT Modifier instead of STR or DEX for Attack and Damage rolls.

ranks.name: Checkmate
ranks.effect: Trigger: You hit an enemy. Effect: The next ally to attack this enemy has Advantage and deals +1d6 Damage.

talents.name: Mastery: Polearm Tactics
talents.description: Controlling space with reach and leverage.

ranks.name: Brace
ranks.effect: Trigger: An enemy enters your Reach. Effect: Make a melee Attack Check against them. If you hit, their Speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

ranks.name: Vault
ranks.effect: Use your weapon to launch yourself. Jump up to 15 feet horizontally or vertically without making an Athletics check. This movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks.

ranks.name: Sweeping Strike
ranks.effect: Make a single Attack Check. Apply the result to the Defense DC of up to 3 enemies within your Reach. Deal normal weapon damage to each one hit.

talents.name: Mastery: Marksman
talents.description: Precision fire with crossbows and bows.

ranks.name: Rapid Reload
ranks.effect: You ignore the 'Reload' property of weapons (e.g., Crossbows). You can fire them every turn without spending an action to reload.

ranks.name: Suppressive Fire
ranks.effect: Target a 10ft radius area. Until the start of your next turn, any enemy in that area has Disadvantage on Attack Checks. If they move out of the area, you can make a free Ranged Attack against them.

ranks.name: Pinning Shot
ranks.effect: Make a Ranged Attack. Hit: Deal Normal Damage and the target is Restrained (pinned to terrain). They must use an Action to make a Strength Check (DC 15) to pull the projectile free.

talents.name: Second Wind
talents.effect: Action: You center yourself and regain 1d10 + Level Hit Points. This can only be used once per combat encounter.

talents.name: Disarming Strike
talents.effect: Action: Make a Melee Attack. Hit: Normal damage. Target must make a Reflex Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: They drop one held item.

talents.name: Trip Attack
talents.effect: Action: Make a Melee Attack. Hit: Normal damage. Target must make a Reflex Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: They are knocked Prone.

talents.name: Interceptor
talents.effect: Trigger: Ally within 5ft is attacked. Effect: You switch places with the ally. The attack targets you instead (Roll Defense normally).

talents.name: Discipline
talents.effect: Trigger: You fail a save vs Fear/Charm/Confusion. Effect: Re-roll the save with Advantage.

talents.name: Sentinel Stance
talents.effect: Action: Stance. Until your next turn, any enemy attempting to leave a space adjacent to you provokes an immediate Opportunity Attack from you. If hit, their Speed becomes 0.

talents.name: Shield Bash
talents.effect: Action: Slam your shield into a foe. Make a Melee Attack. Hit: Deal 1d4 Bludgeoning damage. Target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll or be Stunned for 1 round.

talents.name: Pommel Strike
talents.effect: Action: Strike with the handle of your weapon. Make a Melee Attack. Hit: Deal 1d4 damage. Target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll or be Dazed (Action OR Move only) for 1 round.

talents.name: Toughness
talents.effect: Your physical conditioning is superior. Your Maximum Hit Points increase by 5.

talents.name: Conditioning
talents.effect: You have trained your endurance. Your Maximum Stamina increases by an amount equal to your INT Modifier (minimum 1).

talents.name: Vigilance
talents.effect: You cannot be Surprised while you are conscious. You gain a +2 Bonus to Initiative rolls.
talents.details: Ensures you act early in the tactical order.

talents.name: Penetrating Strike
talents.effect: Action: Make a Weapon Attack. This attack ignores up to 3 points of the target's Armor Score (AS).

talents.name: Grappler
talents.effect: You have Advantage on Athletics checks made to Initiate or Maintain a Grapple. You can Grapple creatures one size larger than yourself.

talents.name: Quick Draw
talents.effect: Trigger: On your turn. Effect: You may stow one weapon and draw another as a Free Action. You gain Advantage on the first attack roll made with the newly drawn weapon this turn.

archetypes.name: The Brute
archetypes.description: A terrifying force of raw, physical power. Fueled by adrenaline and aggression, the Brute smashes armor, terrifies foes, and shrugs off wounds that would kill a lesser warrior.

talents.name: Mastery: Sunderer
talents.description: The art of destroying defenses through overwhelming force.

ranks.name: Dent Armor
ranks.effect: Trigger: When you hit with a melee attack. Effect: The target's Armor Score (AS) is reduced by 1 for the rest of the encounter. This effect can stack.

ranks.name: Shatter
ranks.effect: Attack an object or a creature's shield. Hit: Deal Double Damage to objects. Against a shield, the shield is destroyed (wooden) or useless until repaired (metal), and the bearer takes half damage.

ranks.name: Ruining Blow
ranks.effect: Make a Melee Attack. Hit: Deal Weapon Damage. The target's Armor Score is reduced to 0 for this attack (Ignoring Armor). If the target has natural armor (scales/rock), they are also Bleeding.

talents.name: Mastery: Brawler
talents.description: Fighting dirty with fists, grabs, and living shields.

ranks.name: Iron Grip
ranks.effect: You have Advantage on Athletics checks to Initiate or Maintain a Grapple. You can Grapple creatures up to one size larger than you.

ranks.name: Crush
ranks.effect: Target a creature you are Grappling. Deal automatic Bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 + STR Modifier. The target is also Winded (cannot use Reactions) until the start of your next turn.

ranks.name: Meat Shield
ranks.effect: Trigger: You are targeted by an attack while Grappling a creature. Effect: Make an Athletics Check vs the Attack Roll. Success: You redirect the attack to the creature you are grappling. They take the damage instead of you.

talents.name: Mastery: Menace
talents.description: Using size and aggression to break enemy morale.

ranks.name: Intimidating Glare
ranks.effect: Target one enemy within 30ft. Make an Intimidation (CHA) Check vs their Will Save. Fail: They are Frightened of you for 1 minute (Save ends). They cannot move closer to you.

ranks.name: Prey on the Weak
ranks.effect: You have Advantage on Attack Checks against creatures that are Frightened, Prone, or Restrained.

ranks.name: Roar of Triumph
ranks.effect: Trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 HP. Effect: All enemies within 30ft must make a Will Save vs your Intimidation Check. Fail: They are Dazed (Action OR Move only) for 1 round.

talents.name: Mastery: Heavy Handed
talents.description: Wielding massive weapons with crushing efficiency.

ranks.name: Weighted Blows
ranks.effect: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for a Two-Handed weapon, you can re-roll the die and must use the new roll.

ranks.name: Staggering Blow
ranks.effect: Trigger: When you hit a creature with a Heavy weapon. Effect: The target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: They are Dazed (Action OR Move only) until the end of their next turn.

ranks.name: Pulverize
ranks.effect: Make a Melee Attack against a Prone or Stunned target. This attack deals Double Damage. If it reduces the target to 0 HP, excess damage carries over to an adjacent enemy.

talents.name: Mastery: Rampage
talents.description: Building momentum to crash through enemy lines.

ranks.name: Momentum
ranks.effect: If you move at least 15 feet in a straight line before attacking, you gain a +2 Bonus to the Damage Roll.

ranks.name: Trample
ranks.effect: Move up to your Speed through enemy spaces. Any enemy you pass through must make a Reflex Save vs your Athletics (STR) Check. Fail: They take 1d6+STR Bludgeoning damage and are knocked Prone.

ranks.name: Killing Spree
ranks.effect: Trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 HP. Effect: You immediately regain 1 Stamina and can make one Melee Attack against a different target within reach.

talents.name: Savage Strike
talents.effect: Trigger: When you hit with a melee weapon attack. Effect: Add 1d8 to the damage roll. If you are wielding a Two-Handed weapon, add 1d10 instead.

talents.name: Bull Rush
talents.effect: Action: Move up to your Speed in a straight line. If you enter an enemy's space, make an Athletics Check vs their Reflex Save. Success: You push them 10 feet and knock them Prone.

talents.name: Hurl Object
talents.effect: Action: Pick up and throw a heavy object (rock, chair, goblin) up to 30ft. Make a Ranged Attack using STR. Hit: Deal 1d8 + STR Damage. If the object was a creature, they also take the damage and land Prone.

talents.name: Shrug It Off
talents.effect: Trigger: You take Physical Damage. Effect: Reduce the damage taken by 1d12 + CON Modifier. You cannot use this if you are wearing Heavy Armor.

talents.name: Thick Hide
talents.effect: While you are not wearing armor, your Armor Score (AS) is 2. You can still use a Shield. (Does not stack with worn armor).

talents.name: Vigorous
talents.effect: Your Maximum Stamina increases by an amount equal to your STR Modifier (minimum 1).

talents.name: Diehard
talents.effect: When you are at 0 HP and must make a CON Check (Death Save) to avoid dying, you have Advantage on the roll.

talents.name: Reckless Swing
talents.effect: Free Action: Declare before attacking. You gain Advantage on your Attack Check. However, all attacks against you have Advantage until the start of your next turn.

talents.name: Fling
talents.effect: Action: Choose a creature you are Grappling. Make an Athletics Check vs their Fortitude Save. Success: Throw them up to 15 feet. They take 2d6 Impact damage and land Prone. If thrown into another creature, both take the damage.

talents.name: Stomp
talents.effect: Action: You slam your foot into the ground. All creatures within 5 feet must make a Reflex Save vs your Athletics Check. Fail: They take 1d4 damage and are knocked Prone.

talents.name: Headbutt
talents.effect: Action: Make an Unarmed Strike. Hit: Deal 1d4 damage. Target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: Target is Stunned for 1 round. You take 1 damage.

talents.name: Brute's Vitality
talents.effect: Your mass makes you harder to kill. Your Maximum HP increases by an amount equal to your Level + CON Modifier.

talents.name: Bloodthirst
talents.effect: Whenever you reduce a creature of Small size or larger to 0 HP with a melee attack, you gain Temporary HP equal to your CON Modifier (minimum 1).
talents.details: Rewards aggression.

talents.name: Imposing Stature
talents.effect: You can use your Strength Modifier instead of Charisma for Intimidation checks. You gain Advantage on Intimidation checks against creatures smaller than you.
talents.details: Roleplay utility for big characters.

talents.name: Iron Will
talents.effect: You have Advantage on Saving Throws to resist Charm, Sleep, or Mind Control effects.
talents.details: Too stubborn to be controlled.

archetypes.name: The Guardian
archetypes.description: The immovable object. A master of shields, heavy armor, and polearms who controls the battlefield, intercepts attacks, and refuses to let their allies fall.

talents.name: Mastery: Shield Arts
talents.description: Turning a slab of steel into a weapon and a wall.

ranks.name: Bastion
ranks.effect: While wielding a Shield, you gain a +1 Bonus to Block (CON) Defense Checks.

ranks.name: Shield Slam
ranks.effect: Make a Melee Attack with your Shield. Hit: Deal 1d4 + STR Damage. The target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: They are Dazed (Action OR Move only) until the end of their next turn.

ranks.name: Living Fortress
ranks.effect: You provide Half Cover (+2 Defense) to all allies adjacent to you. You cannot be Flanked.

talents.name: Mastery: Sentinel
talents.description: Controlling the battlefield and punishing movement.

ranks.name: Vigilance
ranks.effect: Trigger: An enemy makes a melee attack against an ally within your Reach (5ft or 10ft). Effect: Make a Melee Attack against the enemy. If you hit, their attack has Disadvantage.

ranks.name: Halt
ranks.effect: When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack (Reaction), their Speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

ranks.name: Whirlwind Guard
ranks.effect: Stance. Until the start of your next turn, you can make an Opportunity Attack against EVERY enemy that moves out of a square within your Reach (not just one).

talents.name: Mastery: Protector
talents.description: Sacrificing self to ensure the survival of others.

ranks.name: Bodyguard
ranks.effect: Trigger: An ally within 5ft is targeted by an attack. Effect: You switch places with the ally. The attack targets you instead (Roll Defense normally).

ranks.name: Sacrifice
ranks.effect: Trigger: An adjacent ally takes damage. Effect: You take the damage instead. The damage is reduced by 1d8 + CON Modifier (Minimum 1 damage).

ranks.name: Avenger
ranks.effect: Whenever an ally within 10 feet of you takes damage from an enemy, you have Advantage on your next Attack Check against that enemy.

talents.name: Mastery: Polearm Warden
talents.description: Using reach to control the flow of battle.

ranks.name: Distancing Strike
ranks.effect: Trigger: When you hit with a melee attack. Effect: Push the target 5 feet away from you. This movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks.

ranks.name: Leg Sweep
ranks.effect: Make a single Attack Check against up to 2 adjacent enemies within your Reach. On Hit: Deal 1d4 Damage and the target is knocked Prone.

ranks.name: Zone of Denial
ranks.effect: Any space within your weapon's Reach is considered Difficult Terrain for enemies. They must spend double movement to approach or bypass you.

talents.name: Mastery: Iron Constitution
talents.description: Hardening the body against pain and death.

ranks.name: Resilient
ranks.effect: You have Advantage on Saving Throws to resist Poison, Disease, and the Stunned condition.

ranks.name: Shake It Off
ranks.effect: Trigger: You start your turn with a negative condition (Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned). Effect: End one of these conditions immediately.

ranks.name: Unbreakable
ranks.effect: Trigger: You are reduced to 0 Hit Points. Effect: You drop to 1 HP instead. You can use this once per combat encounter.

talents.name: Heavy Armor Training
talents.effect: You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armor. You ignore the CON +2 requirement for wearing it (you must still meet the STR requirement).
talents.details: Essential for the high-AC fantasy.

talents.name: Dig In
talents.effect: You have Advantage on checks to resist being Knocked Prone, Pushed, or moved against your will.
talents.details: You are the anchor.

talents.name: Goad
talents.effect: Action: Target one enemy within 30ft. Make an Intimidation Check vs their Will Save. Success: The target has Disadvantage on all attacks that do not include you as a target until the start of your next turn.

talents.name: Second Wind
talents.effect: Action: You center yourself and regain 1d10 + Level Hit Points. This can only be used once per combat encounter.

talents.name: Guardian's Vigor
talents.effect: You have learned to harness your endurance. Your Maximum Stamina increases by an amount equal to your CON Modifier (minimum 1).

talents.name: Tower Shield Specialist
talents.effect: You can wield a Tower Shield effectively. Your Shield's Armor Score bonus increases to +2 (Total), but you suffer Disadvantage on Parry Defense Checks and Initiative rolls.
talents.details: Trades speed for raw mitigation.

talents.name: Concussion
talents.effect: Action: Make a Melee Attack (Best with Mace/Hammer). Hit: Deal Weapon Damage. Target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: Target is Confused (Random Action) for 1 round.

talents.name: Shield Charge
talents.effect: Action: Move up to your Speed. If you end adjacent to an enemy, make a Melee Attack with your Shield (1d4 + STR Dmg). On Hit: Target is Knocked Prone.

talents.name: Rush to Aid
talents.effect: Action: Move up to your Speed towards an ally. This movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks. If you end adjacent to the ally, they gain +2 Defense against the next attack made against them.

talents.name: Armor Maintenance
talents.effect: Action: Spend 1 Dungeon Turn to repair a damaged suit of armor or shield (restoring lost AS). Requires no materials if the damage was minor/recent. DC 11 Craft Check.

talents.name: Warning Shout
talents.effect: Trigger: An ally is about to be hit by an attack you can see. Effect: Shout a warning. The ally gains a +2 Bonus to their Defense Check against that specific attack.

talents.name: Interpose
talents.effect: Trigger: An ally within 5ft is attacked. Effect: You grant them Half Cover (+2 AC) against the attack by placing your shield or body in the way.

talents.name: Stalwart Defender
talents.effect: You and all allies within 5 feet of you have Advantage on Saving Throws to resist Fear.
talents.details: Your courage holds the line.

talents.name: Vigilant Rest
talents.effect: You can sleep in armor without penalty. While sleeping or resting, you are not considered Unconscious for the purposes of Perception checks. You wake instantly at signs of danger.
talents.details: Ideal for camping in dungeons.

talents.name: Formation Fighting
talents.effect: While you are adjacent to an ally who also has a Shield or Heavy Armor, you both gain +1 to Defense Checks.
talents.details: Rewards coordinated positioning.

archetypes.name: The Skirmisher
archetypes.description: A blur of motion on the battlefield. Whether an elusive archer, a dual-wielding dervish, or a martial artist, the Skirmisher relies on speed, precision, and evasion rather than armor.

talents.name: Mastery: Sharpshooter
talents.description: Expertise with the bow and crossbow.

ranks.name: Point Blank
ranks.effect: You do not suffer Disadvantage when making Ranged Attacks against enemies within 5 feet of you.

ranks.name: Parting Shot
ranks.effect: Trigger: An enemy ends their turn adjacent to you. Effect: You can move up to 15 feet away without provoking counter-attacks. Immediately after moving, make a single Ranged Attack against them.

ranks.name: Multi-Shot
ranks.effect: You nock two arrows at once. Make two separate Ranged Attack Checks against two different targets within 10 feet of each other. If both hit, the second target is Pinned (Speed 0).

talents.name: Mastery: Dervish
talents.description: A storm of blades using two weapons.

ranks.name: Off-Hand Strike
ranks.effect: Trigger: When you take the Attack action. Effect: Make one additional attack with your off-hand weapon. Do not add your Ability Modifier to the damage of this extra attack.

ranks.name: Twin-Blade Parry
ranks.effect: While wielding two weapons, you gain a +1 Bonus to Parry (DEX/STR) Defense Checks.

ranks.name: Whirlwind
ranks.effect: You spin in a circle. Make a melee Attack Check against EVERY enemy adjacent to you. Deal normal weapon damage to each target hit.

talents.name: Mastery: Acrobat
talents.description: Using mobility as both defense and offense.

ranks.name: Tumble
ranks.effect: Move up to your Speed. During this move, you can pass through spaces occupied by enemies and do not provoke Opportunity Attacks.

ranks.name: Evasion
ranks.effect: When you are subjected to an effect that allows a Reflex Save for half damage (like a Fireball), you take 0 damage if you succeed on the save, and only half damage if you fail.

ranks.name: Wall Run
ranks.effect: You can move along vertical surfaces and across liquids on your turn without falling during the move. If you end your turn in the air/wall, you fall.

talents.name: Mastery: Pugilist
talents.description: Turning the body into a lethal weapon.

ranks.name: Iron Fists
ranks.effect: Your Unarmed Strikes deal 1d6 Damage (instead of 1d4) and gain the Finesse property (can use DEX).

ranks.name: One-Two Punch
ranks.effect: Trigger: When you hit with an Unarmed Strike. Effect: Make a second Unarmed Strike against the same target immediately.

ranks.name: Stunning Palm
ranks.effect: Make a Melee Attack. Hit: Deal Normal Damage. The target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: They are Stunned (Incapacitated) for 1 round.

talents.name: Mastery: Duelist
talents.description: The art of the single blade and the empty hand.

ranks.name: Fencer's Stance
ranks.effect: When wielding a single melee weapon and no shield, you gain a +2 Bonus to Damage Rolls.

ranks.name: Parry
ranks.effect: Trigger: You are hit by a melee attack. Effect: Reduce the damage taken by 1d8 + DEX Modifier. If damage is reduced to 0, you may make an immediate counter-attack.

ranks.name: Precision Thrust
ranks.effect: Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. This attack Ignores Armor Score. On a Critical Hit, the target is also Bleeding.

talents.name: Unarmored Agility
talents.effect: While you are wearing no armor, your Armor Score (AS) is equal to your DEX Modifier (Max +3). You can still use a Shield.

talents.name: Deflect Missile
talents.effect: Trigger: You are hit by a ranged weapon attack. Effect: Reduce the damage by 1d10 + DEX Modifier. If you reduce the damage to 0, you catch the missile.

talents.name: Skirmisher's Vigor
talents.effect: You have honed your stamina. Your Maximum Stamina increases by an amount equal to your DEX Modifier (minimum 1).

talents.name: Throwing Ace
talents.effect: You gain a +1 Bonus to Attack Checks with Thrown weapons. The normal range of your Thrown weapons increases by 20 feet.
talents.details: Makes daggers and axes viable at range.

talents.name: Blind-Fight
talents.effect: You do not suffer Disadvantage when attacking enemies you cannot see (Invisible or Darkness), provided you can hear them. You are immune to the Blinded condition caused by non-magical darkness.

talents.name: Feather Step
talents.effect: You ignore Difficult Terrain (rubble, mud, undergrowth). You have Advantage on Stealth checks to move silently.

talents.name: Cat's Grace
talents.effect: You have Advantage on all Acrobatics Checks and Reflex Saving Throws.

talents.name: Adrenaline Rush
talents.effect: Free Action: You can take one additional Action this turn. This action can only be used to Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Item.

talents.name: Cheap Shot
talents.effect: Action: Make a Melee or Ranged Attack. Hit: Deal 1d4 Damage. Target must make a Fortitude Save vs Attack Roll. Fail: Target is Dazed (Action OR Move only) or Prone (your choice).

talents.name: Roll With It
talents.effect: Trigger: You take Falling Damage or Knockback damage. Effect: Reduce the damage by half and you land on your feet (not Prone).

talents.name: Fleet of Foot
talents.effect: Your Base Speed increases by 10 feet. You have Advantage on Athletics checks made to Jump.

talents.name: Ambush
talents.effect: During the first round of combat, you have Advantage on Attack Checks against any creature that has not acted yet.

talents.name: Sprint
talents.effect: Bonus Action: You take the Dash action (Move up to your Speed again).

talents.name: Sniper's Nest
talents.effect: If you do not move during your turn, you gain +2 to Ranged Attack Rolls and you are considered to have Half Cover (+2 Defense) until you move.

talents.name: Dirty Kick
talents.effect: Action: Make a Melee Attack (Unarmed). Hit: Deal 1d4 damage. Target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: Target is Dazed for 1 round or Prone (your choice).

archetypes.name: The Rogue
archetypes.description: A master of stealth, deception, and dirty fighting. The Rogue relies on Luck to survive impossible odds and a belt full of dangerous tools to create chaos.

talents.name: Exploit: Vanish
talents.effect: Free Action: Create a distraction (sand in eyes, cape flourish). You immediately attempt a Stealth Check to become Hidden, even if you are being observed by enemies.
talents.details: Allows you to hide in the middle of a duel.

talents.name: Exploit: Kidney Shot
talents.effect: Action: Make a Melee or Ranged Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal normal Weapon Damage and the target is Stunned (Incapacitated) until the start of your next turn.
talents.details: A dirty hit that buys your team a full round of safety.

talents.name: Exploit: Evasive Roll
talents.effect: Trigger: You are hit by an attack or fail a Reflex Save. Effect: You take Half Damage from the source and immediately move up to 15 feet without provoking Opportunity Attacks.
talents.details: Turns a fatal blow into a glancing scratch.

talents.name: Exploit: Luck of the Devil
talents.effect: Trigger: You fail a Saving Throw against a Spell or Magical Effect. Effect: Re-roll the save. You must use the new result.
talents.details: A magical safety net for a non-magical character.

talents.name: Exploit: Misdirection
talents.effect: Trigger: An enemy misses you with a Melee Attack. Effect: You redirect their momentum. The attacker makes a new Attack Roll against a creature of your choice adjacent to you (other than itself).
talents.details: Force enemies to hit their allies.

talents.name: Exploit: Silver Tongue
talents.effect: Trigger: You fail a Deception or Influence check. Effect: You spin a complex lie to cover your mistake. Treat the roll as a Natural 20.
talents.details: Talk your way out of execution or into a vault.

talents.name: Exploit: Escape Artist
talents.effect: Trigger: You are Grappled, Restrained, or tied up. Effect: You automatically escape the condition. You may immediately shift 5 feet to an unoccupied space.
talents.details: Never get pinned down.

talents.name: Exploit: Cheap Shot
talents.effect: Free Action: Declare before making an attack. If the attack hits, the target is Blinded or Silenced (your choice) until the start of your next turn.
talents.details: Go for the eyes or the throat.

talents.name: Exploit: Cat's Landing
talents.effect: Trigger: You fall. Effect: You take 0 Falling Damage and land on your feet (not Prone).
talents.details: Essential for vertical dungeon traversal.

talents.name: Exploit: Stroke of Luck
talents.effect: Trigger: You fail a d20 Check. Effect: Treat the d20 roll as a 12 (plus modifiers). This often turns a failure into a success for standard tasks.
talents.details: Turn a bad roll into a mediocre (but passing) one.

talents.name: Schematic: Saboteur's Kit
talents.description: Recipes for controlling the battlefield.

recipes.name: Smoke Bomb
recipes.effect: Thrown (30ft). 15ft Radius cloud. Heavily Obscured (Blocks Line of Sight) for 1 minute.

recipes.name: Flash Powder
recipes.effect: Thrown (15ft). 10ft Radius. Creatures must make a Fortitude Save or be Blinded for 1 round.

recipes.name: Grease Vial
recipes.effect: Thrown (30ft). Coats 10ft square. Difficult Terrain. Reflex Save or fall Prone.

talents.name: Schematic: Trapper's Gear
talents.description: Tools to secure a perimeter or cover a retreat.

recipes.name: Caltrops
recipes.effect: Action. Cover 10ft square. Difficult Terrain. Moving through deals 1d4 damage and stops movement.

recipes.name: Snare Wire
recipes.effect: Action. Set in a doorway or hall. Next creature to enter must make Reflex Save or be Grappled (Hanging upside down).

recipes.name: Bell Alarm
recipes.effect: Action. Rig a tripwire. Emits a loud ringing if crossed. Cannot be disarmed without Thieves' Tools.

talents.name: Schematic: Forger's Kit
talents.description: Tools for social infiltration and deception.

recipes.name: False Papers
recipes.effect: Downtime. Create travel papers, orders, or identification. Grants Advantage on Influence checks to bypass guards.

recipes.name: Counterfeit Coins
recipes.effect: Downtime. Create 50gp worth of fake gold. Scrutiny Check (DC 15) reveals them as fake.

recipes.name: Sealed Letter
recipes.effect: Action. Forge a letter with a specific wax seal. Essential for tricking officials.

talents.name: Opportunist
talents.effect: You deal +1d6 extra damage when you hit a target that is Flanked, Prone, or Stunned.
talents.details: The core damage scaler for the rogue. Encourages teamwork.

talents.name: Cunning Action
talents.effect: You can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a Move Action instead of a Standard Action.
talents.details: Allows you to Move -> Dash -> Attack, or Attack -> Disengage -> Move.

talents.name: Second-Story Work
talents.effect: You gain a Climb Speed equal to your Walking Speed. You have Advantage on Acrobatics checks to maintain balance on narrow surfaces.
talents.details: Opens up verticality in dungeon traversal.

talents.name: Poisoner's Hands
talents.effect: You can apply a Poison or Toxin to a weapon as a Free Action. The poison lasts for 1 minute or until you hit 3 times (normally 1 hit).
talents.details: Makes expensive poisons much more efficient.

talents.name: Dungeon Delver
talents.effect: You have Advantage on Scrutiny (WIS) checks to locate Traps and Secret Doors. You can search for traps while moving at full speed without penalty.
talents.details: The classic scout ability.

talents.name: Expertise
talents.effect: Choose one Skill you are Trained (d4) in. Upgrade it to Expert (d6).
talents.details: Allows specialization in Stealth, Thievery, or Deception.

talents.name: Fortune's Favorite
talents.effect: Your Maximum Luck increases by +1.
talents.details: More fuel for your Exploits.

archetypes.name: The Warden
archetypes.description: A master of the wild, traps, and tracking. The Warden controls the battlefield with snares, supports the party with herbal remedies, and fights alongside a loyal beast.

talents.name: Mastery: Beast Bond
talents.description: You have formed a bond with a wild predator (Wolf, Boar, or Large Bird).

ranks.name: Call Companion
ranks.effect: You gain a Beast Companion. Stats: HP = Level x 4. Armor Score = 1. Damage = 1d6. Speed = 40ft. It acts on your turn, but requires you to spend a Move Action to command it to Attack. If you do not command it, it only Defends/Follows.

ranks.name: Pack Tactics
ranks.effect: You gain Advantage on Attack Checks against any creature that is currently adjacent to your Beast Companion.

ranks.name: Dire Beast
ranks.effect: Your Companion grows in size and power. Its Damage die becomes 1d8, its Armor Score becomes 2, and its Max HP becomes Level x 8.

talents.name: Mastery: Archery
talents.description: Specialized training with the bow and crossbow.

ranks.name: Steady Aim
ranks.effect: You gain a +2 Bonus to Attack Checks with Ranged Weapons if you have not moved yet this turn.

ranks.name: Close Quarters Shooter
ranks.effect: You do not suffer Disadvantage on Ranged Attack Checks when an enemy is within 5 feet of you.

ranks.name: Pinning Shot
ranks.effect: Trigger: You hit with a Ranged Attack. Effect: The target must make a Reflex Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: They are Restrained (pinned to terrain) until they use an Action to pull the arrow free.

talents.name: Mastery: Stalker
talents.description: Fighting techniques for ambushing and skirmishing in dense terrain.

ranks.name: Ambusher
ranks.effect: In the first round of combat, you have Advantage on Attack Checks against any creature that has not yet acted.

ranks.name: Hit and Run
ranks.effect: After you make a Melee Attack, you can move up to 10 feet immediately. This movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks.

ranks.name: Cull the Weak
ranks.effect: Trigger: You hit a target that is below 50% HP or has a Negative Condition (Bleeding/Slowed). Effect: Deal maximum weapon damage (do not roll).

talents.name: Schematic: Bushcraft
talents.description: Recipes for surviving the wild and capturing prey.

recipes.name: Healing Poultice
recipes.effect: Action. Apply to creature. Restores 1d4 HP and ends Bleeding. Takes 1 minute to take effect.

recipes.name: Net Trap
recipes.effect: Action. Set trap. Trigger: Creature enters space. Effect: Restrained (Hanging). Escape DC 13 (STR).

recipes.name: Antitoxin
recipes.effect: Action. Consume to end Poisoned condition and gain Advantage on Fortitude Saves for 1 hour.

talents.name: Schematic: Hunter's Tools
talents.description: Preparations for stalking and trapping prey.

recipes.name: Camouflage Paint
recipes.effect: Action. Apply to self or ally. Advantage on Stealth Checks in natural environments for 1 hour.

recipes.name: Musk Lure
recipes.effect: Action. Apply to area. Beasts and Monstrosities within 300ft are drawn to the scent (Will Save to resist).

recipes.name: Spike Trap
recipes.effect: Action. Conceal on ground. Trigger: Step. Effect: 2d6 Piercing Damage + Bleeding. (Single Target).

talents.name: Exploit: Hunter's Mark
talents.effect: Free Action: Mark a visible enemy. For the rest of the encounter, you deal +1d4 extra damage to that target with Weapon Attacks. You cannot lose the trail of a Marked target.
talents.details: Focus fire on the priority target.

talents.name: Exploit: Hail of Thorns
talents.effect: Action: Make a Ranged Attack against a target. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage. Regardless of Hit/Miss, thorns explode from the projectile. The target and all adjacent creatures take 1d6 Piercing Damage.
talents.details: Area of effect damage for archers.

talents.name: Exploit: Shake It Off
talents.effect: Trigger: You are affected by a Physical Condition (Poisoned, Bleeding, Blinded, Slowed). Effect: You immediately end the condition.
talents.details: Your constitution is supernatural.

talents.name: Exploit: Covering Fire
talents.effect: Trigger: An enemy makes an attack against an ally. Effect: Make an immediate Ranged Attack against that enemy. If you hit, their attack has Disadvantage.
talents.details: Protect your team from a distance.

talents.name: Exploit: Volley
talents.effect: Action: You fire a rapid succession of shots. Select a 10-foot radius area within range. You make a separate Ranged Attack Check against every enemy within that area.
talents.details: Crowd control for swarms.

talents.name: Exploit: Primal Sense
talents.effect: Action: You extend your senses. For 1 minute, you know the location of all living creatures within 60 feet, regardless of walls, invisibility, or stealth. You cannot be Surprised.
talents.details: Impossible to ambush.

talents.name: Exploit: Feral Strike
talents.effect: Free Action: Trigger when you hit with a Melee Attack. Roll the weapon's damage dice twice and use the sum (Double Dice Damage).
talents.details: Brutal melee burst.

talents.name: Exploit: Go for the Throat
talents.effect: Trigger: You score a Critical Hit. Effect: The target is Silenced (cannot speak/cast) and Bleeding (1d4/turn) for 1 minute.
talents.details: Disable casters instantly.

talents.name: Exploit: Beast's Fury
talents.effect: Command: Your Beast Companion enters a frenzy. It makes Two Attacks this turn instead of one. If both hit, the target is knocked Prone.
talents.details: Requires a Beast Companion.

talents.name: Natural Explorer
talents.effect: You ignore Difficult Terrain caused by nature (undergrowth, snow, mud). You have Advantage on Survival (WIS) checks to track creatures or find food/water.
talents.details: You dictate where the fight happens in the wild.

talents.name: Trophy Hunter
talents.effect: You gain Advantage on checks to Harvest monster parts. When you successfully harvest 'Organics' or 'Flora', you gain 2 Batches instead of 1.
talents.details: Increases resource generation for the party.

talents.name: Vigilant
talents.effect: You cannot be Surprised while you are conscious. You add your WIS Modifier to your Initiative rolls.
talents.details: You always act in the first round.

talents.name: Forager
talents.effect: You automatically find enough food and water for yourself and your Beast Companion each day, provided you are in a natural environment. You do not consume Rations.
talents.details: Negates the resource drain of travel.

talents.name: Strider
talents.effect: Your Base Speed increases by +5 feet. Climbing and Swimming no longer cost extra movement.
talents.details: Superior mobility in complex terrain.

talents.name: Iron Gut
talents.effect: You have Resistance to Poison Damage and Advantage on Saving Throws against Disease.
talents.details: Survival against venomous monsters.

archetypes.name: The Leader
archetypes.description: A commander who inspires allies and manipulates enemies. Their voice is a weapon, turning the tide of battle through coordination, morale, and social engineering.

talents.name: Exploit: Inspiring Word
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when an ally within 30ft fails a d20 Check (Attack, Save, or Skill). Effect: They immediately Re-roll the check with Advantage. They must use the new result.
talents.details: Can save a life on a Death Save or ensure a critical attack lands.

talents.name: Exploit: Get in Position!
talents.effect: Action: Command one ally you can see. Effect: That ally can immediately use their Reaction to move up to their Full Speed. This movement does not provoke counter-attacks.
talents.details: Perfect for rescuing a wizard or sending a brute to the front.

talents.name: Exploit: Coordinated Strike
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when you hit an enemy with an attack. Effect: Choose one ally within 30ft. That ally can immediately use their Reaction to make a single Weapon Attack against the same enemy.
talents.details: Doubles the output of your action by leveraging a stronger ally.

talents.name: Exploit: Rallying Cry
talents.effect: Action: Deliver a stirring speech. One willing ally within 30ft immediately regains 1d6 + CHA Modifier Hit Points. If they are at 0 HP, they also stand up.
talents.details: A verbal-only heal, effective even when bound or disarmed.

talents.name: Exploit: Distracting Banter
talents.effect: Action: Target one enemy who can hear you. Make an Influence Check vs. their Will Save Value. Success: The target is Dazed (Action OR Move only) for 1 round as they hesitate or argue back.
talents.details: Breaks the action economy of elite enemies.

talents.name: Exploit: Terrifying Presence
talents.effect: Action: Target one enemy. Make an Intimidation Check vs. their Will Save Value. Success: The target is Frightened of you for 1 minute. They cannot move closer to you and have Disadvantage on attacks.
talents.details: Excellent for peeling melee enemies off yourself.

talents.name: Exploit: Selfless Sacrifice
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when an ally within 30ft takes damage. Effect: Shout a warning. The damage they take is Halved (Round down).
talents.details: Mitigates massive spikes of damage from bosses.

talents.name: Exploit: Fast Friends
talents.effect: Action: Make an Influence Check (DC 13) against a non-hostile NPC. Success: Their attitude improves to 'Helpful' for 10 minutes. They will share secrets, lower prices (10%), or grant access to restricted areas.
talents.details: Bypasses long roleplay negotiations when time is tight.

talents.name: Schematic: Espionage Tools
talents.description: Tools for infiltration, impersonation, and bureaucracy.

recipes.name: Disguise Kit
recipes.effect: Action to apply. You adopt a new persona for 1 hour. You have Advantage on Deception checks to maintain this identity.

recipes.name: Forged Documents
recipes.effect: Downtime. Create official-looking papers (Travel Writ, Guild License, Royal Decree). Grants Advantage on Influence checks involving authority.

recipes.name: Invisible Ink
recipes.effect: Downtime. Write a message visible only when heated or treated with vinegar. Essential for secret communication.

talents.name: Inspiring Vitality
talents.effect: At the start of combat (Initiative Count 0), all allies who can hear you (including yourself) gain 1d4 Temporary Hit Points.
talents.details: A buffer against the first blow of every fight.

talents.name: Loyal Follower
talents.effect: You gain a Hireling (Squire, Porter, or Herald) who serves for free. They are a non-combatant (1 HP, no attacks) but can carry loot (4 Slots), hold torches, and perform simple tasks. If killed, you find a replacement during Downtime.
talents.details: Never carry your own torch again.

talents.name: Demoralizing Strike
talents.effect: Free Action: When you hit an enemy with a weapon attack, make an Intimidation Check vs. their Will Save Value. Success: Their next attack has Disadvantage. Limit: You can use this a number of times per combat equal to your CHA Modifier.
talents.details: Weave social attacks into physical combat.

talents.name: Lend Expertise
talents.effect: When you use the Help action to aid an ally's skill check, they gain Advantage AND add your Proficiency Die to their roll.
talents.details: Makes you the ultimate assistant for complex tasks.

talents.name: Negotiator
talents.effect: Action: Make an Influence Check vs. a hostile leader's Will Save Value. Success: Combat pauses for 1 round for a parley. The pause ends instantly if any violence occurs. Use this to surrender, bribe, or intimidate.
talents.details: A chance to stop a TPK (Total Party Kill) before it happens.

talents.name: Commanding
talents.effect: Your Maximum Luck increases by 1.
talents.details: Leaders need deep reserves of luck.

talents.name: Expertise
talents.effect: Choose one Trained Skill (Influence, Deception, Intimidation). You become Expert (d6) in that skill.
talents.details: Dominate social encounters.

talents.name: Commander's Presence
talents.effect: Allies within 10 feet of you gain a +1 Bonus to Saving Throws made to resist Fear or Charm effects.
talents.details: Keeps the party disciplined.

talents.name: Exploit: Battlefield Commander
talents.effect: Action: Choose one ally within 30 feet. That ally immediately takes one Standard Action (Attack, Cast Spell, Use Item) as a Free Action. This does not cost their Reaction.
talents.details: Trade your turn to let the Wizard cast a second Fireball.

talents.name: Voice of Authority
talents.effect: You project an aura of command. When you issue orders to NPCs of lower station (guards, servants, commoners), you automatically succeed on Influence checks unless the order is dangerous or contradicts a direct superior.
talents.details: You belong here. They know it, you know it. Walk right past the gate.

talents.name: Social Camouflage
talents.effect: You can blend into any group of 3 or more humanoids. While blended, you are considered Hidden from casual observation and can move with the crowd without making Stealth checks.
talents.details: Hide in plain sight.

archetypes.name: The Crafter
archetypes.description: A master of preparation and inventory. You solve problems with alchemy, clockwork gadgets, and the right tool for the job. Your power is limited only by your supplies.

talents.name: Mastery: Clockwork Engineering
talents.description: You construct and upgrade a mechanical servant.

ranks.name: Automaton Assistant
ranks.effect: You build a Tiny construct (Spider/Owl). Stats: 5 HP, AC 12, Speed 30ft. It cannot attack. It acts on your turn to Scout, Trigger Traps, or Deliver Touch Items. If destroyed, repair during Downtime.

ranks.name: Upgraded Chassis
ranks.effect: Your Automaton gains a Fly Speed of 30ft (or Climb 30ft). Its Armor Score increases to 3, and its HP increases to 15. It gains resistance to non-magical physical damage.

ranks.name: Detonation Protocol
ranks.effect: Trigger: Your Automaton is reduced to 0 HP or you command it (Free Action). Effect: It explodes in a 10ft Radius. Deal 4d6 Fire/Force damage to all creatures (Reflex Save for half). The Automaton is destroyed (Must be rebuilt).

talents.name: Schematic: Alchemist's Satchel
talents.description: Fundamental volatile compounds for destruction and utility.

recipes.name: Alchemist's Fire
recipes.effect: Thrown (30ft). Deals 1d6 Fire Damage. The target catches fire (Burning). Action to extinguish.

recipes.name: Acid Flask
recipes.effect: Thrown (30ft). Deals 2d6 Acid Damage. Ignores Armor Score. Can melt standard locks.

recipes.name: Liquid Ice
recipes.effect: Thrown (30ft). Deals 1d6 Cold Damage. Creates a patch of ice (Difficult Terrain). Target must save vs Reflex or fall Prone.

talents.name: Schematic: Tinker's Tools
talents.description: Mechanical devices for crowd control and distraction.

recipes.name: Flashbomb
recipes.effect: Thrown (20ft). 10ft Radius. Creatures must make a Fortitude Save or be Blinded/Deafened for 1 round.

recipes.name: Smoke Bomb
recipes.effect: Thrown (30ft). 15ft Radius cloud. Heavily Obscured (Blocks Line of Sight) for 1 minute.

recipes.name: Noisemaker
recipes.effect: Thrown (30ft). Emits loud clanking/ticking for 1 minute. Draws attention of unintelligent creatures.

talents.name: Schematic: Field Medic
talents.description: Chemical aid for the wounded.

recipes.name: Healing Salve
recipes.effect: Action (Touch). Restore 2d4 Hit Points to a living creature.

recipes.name: Smelling Salts
recipes.effect: Action (Touch). Immediately wake an Unconscious (but stable) creature or end the Stunned condition.

recipes.name: Stamina Brew
recipes.effect: Action (Self). Drink to immediately regain 1d4 Stamina (STA).

talents.name: Schematic: Advanced Mechanics
talents.description: Complex gadgets for traversal and control.

recipes.name: Grapple Gun
recipes.effect: Action. Fire a hook up to 60ft. Retracts to pull you to target or pull target (Small/Medium) to you. (Athletics Check vs Strength).

recipes.name: Tanglefoot Bag
recipes.effect: Thrown (20ft). 5ft Radius. Goo hardens instantly. Creatures are Restrained (Strength DC 13 to break). Flammable.

recipes.name: Spring-Blade
recipes.effect: Concealed Weapon. Deploys instantly. First attack with it has Advantage. Deals 1d6 Damage. Break chance on Crit Fail.

talents.name: Schematic: Toxin Kit
talents.description: Substances to weaken and incapacitate.

recipes.name: Basic Poison
recipes.effect: Coat Weapon. Next Hit: Target must make Fortitude Save or be Poisoned (1d4 dmg/turn) for 1 minute.

recipes.name: Knockout Gas
recipes.effect: Thrown (15ft). Cloud. Creatures must make Fortitude Save or fall Unconscious (Sleep) for 1 minute or until shaken.

recipes.name: Paralytic Agent
recipes.effect: Coat Weapon. Next Hit: Target must make Fortitude Save or be Stunned (Paralyzed) for 1 round.

talents.name: Exploit: Rapid Assembly
talents.effect: Action: You throw together a device in seconds. Create 1 Reagent from any Recipe you know without spending Downtime. You must still pay the Material Cost (Bundles). The item is unstable and becomes useless at the end of the encounter.
talents.details: MacGyver a solution mid-combat.

talents.name: Exploit: Jerry-Rig
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when a non-magical item (weapon, shield, lockpick, bridge) breaks or malfunctions. Effect: You instantly fix it with wire/tape. It functions normally for 10 minutes or the end of combat, then breaks permanently.
talents.details: Saves the party from critical gear failure.

talents.name: Exploit: Salvage
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when you miss with a Thrown Reagent or a Trap fails to trigger. Effect: You scramble to catch it. You recover the item intact. It is added back to your inventory.
talents.details: Prevents wasting expensive materials on bad rolls.

talents.name: Exploit: Compound Formula
talents.effect: Action: You mix two Reagents (e.g., Alchemist's Fire + Glue Bomb) and throw them as a single package. Make one Attack Roll. On a Hit, the target suffers BOTH effects simultaneously.
talents.details: High risk, massive reward.

talents.name: Exploit: Sabotage
talents.effect: Action: Disable a mechanical device or weapon within reach. Automatic success on non-magical locks/traps. Against a creature's weapon: Make a Dexterity Check vs Reflex Save. Success: The weapon is jammed/broken (cannot be used until repaired).
talents.details: Disarm a boss or open a door instantly.

talents.name: Exploit: Overclock
talents.effect: Action: You supercharge your Automaton or a mechanical Ally (like a Warforged). For 1 minute, their Speed is doubled, and they gain +2 AC. At the end of the duration, they take 1d6 damage (overheat).
talents.details: Push the machine to the limit.

talents.name: Grenadier
talents.effect: You can use any 'Thrown' Reagent (e.g., Acid, Bombs) as a Move Action instead of a Standard Action.
talents.details: Essential for action economy. Move -> Throw -> Attack.

talents.name: Volatile Admixture
talents.effect: When you use a Reagent that deals damage, add your INT Modifier to the damage roll. If the item requires a Saving Throw, increase the DC by +1.
talents.details: Makes low-tier items scale with your level.

talents.name: Efficient Crafter
talents.effect: When you succeed on a Crafting Check during Downtime, you create 1 additional item (e.g., 4 bombs instead of 3) at no extra material cost.
talents.details: Stretch your resources further.

talents.name: Hoarder
talents.effect: You are an expert at packing. You gain +2 Inventory Slots. These slots can only be used to carry Reagents, Kits, or Raw Materials.
talents.details: Essential for the resource-heavy Crafter.

talents.name: Field Technician
talents.effect: You can attempt to Repair a broken item or pick a lock as a single Standard Action during combat (normally takes minutes).
talents.details: Fix the bridge while goblins shoot at you.

talents.name: Tinkerer's Cunning
talents.effect: Your Maximum Luck increases by +1.
talents.details: Fuel for your exploits.

talents.name: Expertise
talents.effect: Choose one Skill you are Trained (d4) in. Upgrade it to Expert (d6).
talents.details: Usually Craft & Tinker or Investigate.

talents.name: Hazard Suit
talents.effect: You have Resistance to Acid Damage and Poison Damage due to your specialized gear and careful handling.
talents.details: Safety first when handling volatiles.

archetypes.name: The Arcanist
archetypes.description: The academic of the arcane. You treat magic as a science, mastering spells through study, modification, and raw elemental force. You are the artillery and the architect of the battlefield.

talents.name: Grimoire of the Battle-Mage
talents.description: The standard tactical kit for war mages.

spells.name: Shield
spells.effect: Reaction. Trigger: You are hit by an attack. Make a Casting Check. Success: You gain a +4 Bonus to Defense against the triggering attack and all other attacks until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.effect: Action. Make a Casting Check. Success: You create 3 glowing darts of magical force. They strike unerringly (No Attack Roll needed). Each dart deals 1d4+1 Force damage.

spells.name: Counterspell
spells.effect: Reaction. Trigger: A creature casts a spell. Make a Casting Check vs. the Caster's Will Save (or Casting Result). Success: The creature's spell fails and has no effect.

talents.name: Grimoire of the Pyromancer
talents.description: Studies in combustion and heat.

spells.name: Firebolt
spells.effect: Make a Ranged Casting Check vs. Target's Defense. On Hit: Deal 1d10 Fire damage. On Crit: Target gains Burning condition.

spells.name: Fan of Flames
spells.effect: Flames erupt from your hands. Make a Casting Check. All creatures in the cone compare their Reflex Save vs. your Result. Fail: Take 3d6 Fire damage. Success: Take half damage.

spells.name: Wall of Fire
spells.effect: Create a wall of fire 20ft long and 1ft thick. It blocks line of sight. Any creature passing through or ending its turn in the wall takes 4d6 Fire damage (Reflex vs Result for half).

talents.name: Grimoire of the Cryomancer
talents.description: Studies in entropy and flash-freezing.

spells.name: Ray of Frost
spells.effect: Make a Ranged Casting Check vs. Target's Defense. On Hit: Deal 1d8 Cold damage and the target's Speed is reduced by 10ft.

spells.name: Ice Knife
spells.effect: Make a Ranged Casting Check vs Target's Defense. On Hit: 1d10 Piercing damage. Whether you hit or miss, the shard explodes: Target and all adjacent creatures must make a Reflex Save vs. your Result or take 2d6 Cold damage.

spells.name: Glacial Tomb
spells.effect: Target one creature. Make a Casting Check vs. their Fortitude Save. Fail: Target is Restrained (encased in ice). At the end of each of their turns, they can repeat the save. If they fail 3 times total, they are Petrified (Frozen) until thawed.

talents.name: Grimoire of the Storm
talents.description: Studies in electricity and rapid conduction.

spells.name: Shocking Grasp
spells.effect: Make a Melee Casting Check vs. Defense (Advantage if target is wearing metal). On Hit: Deal 1d10 Lightning damage and target cannot use Reactions (no Opportunity Attacks).

spells.name: Arc Lightning
spells.effect: Make a Ranged Casting Check vs Defense. On Hit: Deal 2d8 Lightning damage. A bolt then leaps to a second target within 15ft of the first (Auto-hit) for 1d8 Lightning damage.

spells.name: Thunder Step
spells.effect: You teleport up to 90ft to an unoccupied space. Immediately after you vanish, a boom sounds. Creatures within 10ft of your starting space must make a Fortitude Save vs. your Result. Fail: 3d10 Thunder damage. Success: Half damage.

talents.name: Grimoire of Force
talents.description: Manipulation of raw kinetic magical energy.

spells.name: Arcane Bolt
spells.effect: A bolt of pure energy. Make a Casting Check vs Defense. On Hit: Deal 1d4+1 Force damage. This attack ignores the target's Armor Score (AS).

spells.name: Shatter
spells.effect: A loud ringing noise erupts in a 10ft radius area. Creatures inside make a Fortitude Save vs Casting Result. Fail: 3d8 Thunder damage (Half on success). Inorganic creatures (Constructs) have Disadvantage on the save.

spells.name: Resilient Sphere
spells.effect: Action. Enclose a creature or object in a shimmering sphere of force. It is immune to all damage, but cannot move or attack anything outside. An unwilling target makes a Reflex Save vs Result to dodge.

talents.name: Grimoire of Transmutation
talents.description: Altering the physical properties of creatures.

spells.name: Expeditious Retreat
spells.effect: Action. Make a Casting Check. Success: Your Speed increases by 10ft, and you can take the Dash action as a Bonus Action on each of your turns.

spells.name: Enlarge / Reduce
spells.effect: Action. Target a creature. Willing targets accept; unwilling make a Fortitude Save vs. Result. Enlarge: Size doubles, +1d4 Strength Damage on attacks. Reduce: Size halves, -1d4 Strength Damage, +2 Stealth.

spells.name: Haste
spells.effect: Action. Choose a willing creature. Speed is doubled, +2 bonus to Defense, and it gains an additional Action on each of its turns (Attack, Dash, or Disengage only). When the spell ends, the target is Dazed for 1 round.

talents.name: Grimoire of Illusion
talents.description: Deceiving the senses and obscuring truth.

spells.name: Blur
spells.effect: Action. Your body becomes blurred and shifting. Attack Checks against you have Disadvantage. This effect does not work if the attacker relies on senses other than sight.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.effect: Action. A creature you touch becomes Invisible. It attacks with Advantage, and attacks against it have Disadvantage. The spell ends immediately if the target attacks or casts a spell.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.effect: Action. Create 3 illusory duplicates. When targeted by an attack, roll d20. On 1-10, the duplicate is hit and destroyed (You take no damage). On 11+, you are targeted normally. Duplicates have Defense 10.

talents.name: Grimoire of Conjuration
talents.description: Summoning matter to hinder foes.

spells.name: Grease
spells.effect: Action. Cover a 10ft square in slick grease. It becomes Difficult Terrain. Any creature entering the area or ending its turn there must make a Reflex Save vs. your Casting Result or fall Prone.

spells.name: Web
spells.effect: Action. Fill a 20ft cube with sticky webs. Area is Difficult Terrain. Creatures starting their turn there must make a Reflex Save vs. Result or be Restrained. They can use an Action to make a Strength check to escape. Webs are flammable.

spells.name: Misty Step
spells.effect: Bonus Action (or Move Action). You teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see. This does not provoke counter-attacks.

talents.name: Grimoire of the Mind
talents.description: Spells to cloud the senses and dominate the will.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.effect: Action. Roll 5d8. This is the total HP of creatures affected in a 20ft Radius. Starting with the creature with the lowest current HP, targets fall Unconscious (cannot wake until damaged or shaken). Undead and Constructs are immune.

spells.name: Hold Person
spells.effect: Action. Target a Humanoid. Make a Casting Check vs. Will Save. Success: Target is Paralyzed (Stunned, attacks against it are Auto-Crits). The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns.

spells.name: Confusion
spells.effect: Action. Target a 10ft Radius. Creatures must make a Will Save vs. Casting Result. Fail: Creatures are Confused. On their turn, roll d6: 1-2 Do nothing, 3-4 Run in random direction, 5-6 Attack nearest creature (friend or foe).

talents.name: Grimoire of Telekinesis
talents.description: Manipulation of matter and gravity.

spells.name: Force Push
spells.effect: Action. Target a creature or object (Medium or smaller). Make a Casting Check vs. Strength Save. Success: The target is pushed 15ft directly away from you. If it hits a wall, it takes 1d6 Impact damage.

spells.name: Levitate
spells.effect: Action. One creature or loose object rises vertically up to 20ft. Unwilling targets make a Fortitude Save to grab onto something. A levitating creature cannot move (Speed 0) unless it can push off a surface.

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.effect: Action. You can manipulate Large or smaller objects/creatures. You can move them 30ft through the air. You can use them as weapons (Casting Check vs Defense, 3d10 damage) or hold them Restrained in the air (Casting vs Strength).

talents.name: Grimoire of Sight
talents.description: Revealing that which is hidden.

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.effect: Action. You sense the presence of magic within 30ft. You see a faint aura around magic items or creatures. You know the school of magic (e.g., Evocation, Necromancy) if you spend an Action focusing.

spells.name: See Invisibility
spells.effect: Action. You see Invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible. You can also see into the Ethereal Plane (ghosts appear distinct).

spells.name: Arcane Eye
spells.effect: Action. You create an invisible magical eye. You mentally receive visual information from it. It has Darkvision 30ft. You can move it 30ft per turn. It can pass through small holes but cannot pass solid barriers.

talents.name: Grimoire of Traversal
talents.description: Overcoming physical barriers and obstacles.

spells.name: Knock
spells.effect: Action. A loud knock emanates from a locked object (door, chest, shackle). A non-magical lock opens instantly. The sound is audible up to 300ft away (Guaranteed to alert nearby enemies).

spells.name: Spider Climb
spells.effect: Action. A willing creature gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free. It gains a Climb Speed equal to its walking speed.

spells.name: Fly
spells.effect: Action. A willing creature gains a Flying Speed of 60ft. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft, unless it can stop the fall.

talents.name: Grimoire of Warding
talents.description: Magical barriers and counter-measures.

spells.name: Mage Armor
spells.effect: Target unarmored creature's skin hardens. Their Base Armor Score becomes 1. (This does not stack with worn armor).

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.effect: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect. Make a Casting Check vs. the DC of the magic (Standard DC 13 if unknown). Success: The spell ends.

spells.name: Globe of Invulnerability
