spells.effect: Create a shimmering barrier. Spells of 1 MP or 2 MP cast from outside the barrier cannot affect creatures or objects inside it.

talents.name: Arcane Recovery
talents.effect: Action: You enter a short meditative trance to reorganize your mind. Regain 1d4 Mana Points (MP). Usable once per Long Rest.
talents.details: Vital for sustaining a long dungeon crawl.

talents.name: Arcane Familiar
talents.effect: You summon a tiny magical spirit (e.g., Owl, Cat, Imp). It acts on your turn. It has 1 HP and cannot attack, but it can Scout (share senses up to 100ft) or use the Help action to give you Advantage on one Check per turn. If destroyed, you must spend a Short Rest and 1 MP to resummon it.
talents.details: The ultimate scout and lab assistant.

talents.name: Arcane Potency
talents.effect: When you roll damage for a Spell, add your INT Modifier to the total.
talents.details: Makes even basic cantrips dangerous.

talents.name: Arcane Focus
talents.effect: You gain a permanent +1 Bonus to all Casting Checks.
talents.details: Reduces the chance of Magic Mishaps.

talents.name: Expanded Mind
talents.effect: Your Maximum Mana (MP) increases by 2.

talents.name: Arcane Studies
talents.effect: Choose one Trained Skill (Lore, Investigate, Craft). You become Expert (d6) in that skill.

talents.name: Arcane Specialization
talents.effect: Choose one Spell Modification (Empower, Range, Widen, Subtle). When you apply this mod to a spell, the DC increase is +1 (instead of the normal +2).
talents.details: Allows for safer pushing of spells.

archetypes.name: The Occultist
archetypes.description: A wielder of forbidden power who bargains with dark entities. You pay for magic with blood, sanity, and the souls of your enemies. You are the most dangerous caster... sometimes to yourself.

talents.name: Rite of Blood
talents.description: Magic fueled by the vitality of the living.

spells.name: Blood Needle
spells.effect: Make a Ranged Casting Check vs. Defense. On Hit: Deal 1d8 Necrotic damage. On a Critical Hit, the target gains the Bleeding condition (1d4 damage/turn).

spells.name: Vampiric Touch
spells.effect: Make a Melee Casting Check vs. Defense. On Hit: Deal 3d6 Necrotic damage. You immediately regain Hit Points equal to half the damage dealt.

spells.name: Exsanguinate
spells.effect: Target a living creature. Make a Casting Check vs. Fortitude Save. Fail: The target takes 6d6 Necrotic Damage as their blood boils. You regain Hit Points equal to 1/4 of the damage dealt. Success: Half damage, no healing.

talents.name: Rite of Shadows
talents.description: Manipulation of darkness and fear.

spells.name: Umbral Armor
spells.effect: You wrap yourself in shadows. You gain +1 Armor Score. While in Dim Light or Darkness, attacks against you have Disadvantage.

spells.name: Darkness
spells.effect: Create a 15ft Radius sphere of magical darkness. Creatures inside are Blinded (unless they have magical Devil's Sight). Non-magical light cannot illuminate this area.

spells.name: Shadow Step
spells.effect: Bonus Action. You teleport from one area of shadow to another up to 60ft away. You immediately gain the Hidden condition, and your next attack this turn has Advantage.

talents.name: Rite of the Void
talents.description: Channeling the madness of the Far Realm.

spells.name: Mind Spike
spells.effect: Target one creature. Casting Check vs. Will Save. Fail: Target takes 1d10 Psychic damage. This spell leaves no physical mark and makes no noise (Subtle).

spells.name: Whispers of Madness
spells.effect: Target up to 3 creatures within range. Casting Check vs. Will Save. Fail: Targets are Dazed (Action OR Move only) until the end of their next turn as they hear screaming voices.

spells.name: Void Tentacles
spells.effect: Create a 20ft square of black, rubbery tentacles. Area is Difficult Terrain. Creatures starting their turn there take 3d6 Bludgeoning damage and are Restrained unless their Strength Save beats your Result.

talents.name: Rite of Ruin
talents.description: Weakening enemies and ensuring their demise.

spells.name: Bane
spells.effect: Target up to 3 enemies. Casting Check vs. Will Save. Fail: Targets subtract 1d4 from all Attack Checks and Saving Throws for the duration.

spells.name: Hex
spells.effect: Target one creature. Casting Check vs. Will Save. Success: You deal +1d6 Necrotic damage whenever you hit it. Also, choose one Attribute (e.g. STR); target has Disadvantage on checks with that stat.

spells.name: Curse of Frailty
spells.effect: Target one creature. Casting Check vs. Fortitude Save. Fail: Target gains Vulnerability to all Physical Damage (takes Double Damage). Target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns.

talents.name: Rite of the Grave
talents.description: Raising the dead and weaponizing corpses.

spells.name: Chill Touch
spells.effect: Make a Ranged Casting Check vs. Defense. On Hit: Deal 1d8 Necrotic damage. The target cannot regain Hit Points until the start of your next turn. If the target is Undead, it has Disadvantage on attacks against you.

spells.name: Animate Dead
spells.effect: Target a pile of bones or a fresh corpse. It rises as a Skeleton or Zombie Minion under your control. Stats: 5 HP, AC 10, Speed 30, Attack +2 (1d6 damage). It acts on your turn (Commanding it requires a Bonus Action). You can control only one at a time.

spells.name: Corpse Explosion
spells.effect: Target a corpse (Medium size or larger). It detonates violently. All creatures within 15ft of the corpse take 4d6 Necrotic damage and are knocked Prone. Reflex Save vs. Casting Result for half damage.

talents.name: Rite of the Infernal
talents.description: Hellfire and demonic wrath.

spells.name: Hellish Rebuke
spells.effect: Reaction. Trigger: You are damaged by a creature. The attacker is surrounded by hellfire. They must make a Reflex Save vs. Casting Result. Fail: 2d10 Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

spells.name: Scorching Ray
spells.effect: You hurl three rays of fire. Make three separate Ranged Casting Checks. You can target one creature or several. On Hit: Each ray deals 2d6 Fire damage.

spells.name: Hellfire Pillar
spells.effect: You call down a column of cursed flame. 10ft Radius, 40ft High cylinder. Creatures inside take 4d6 Fire damage and 2d6 Necrotic damage. Reflex Save vs. Casting Result for half.

talents.name: Rite of Desire
talents.description: Bending wills through charm and madness.

spells.name: Charm Person
spells.effect: Target one humanoid. Casting Check vs. Will Save. Success: Target is Charmed (Friendly, treats you as an acquaintance). The spell ends if you or your allies deal damage to it. Combat Effect: The target will not attack you.

spells.name: Suggestion
spells.effect: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) to a creature that can hear you. Casting Check vs. Will Save. Success: The creature pursues the course of action to the best of its ability. The suggestion must not be obviously self-harming.

spells.name: Crown of Madness
spells.effect: Target one humanoid. Casting Check vs. Will Save. Success: A twisted crown of jagged iron appears on its head. At the start of its turn, it must use its Action to make a melee attack against a creature other than itself that you mentally choose. Target can repeat save at end of turn.

talents.name: Rite of the Chain
talents.description: Binding entities to serve.

spells.name: Unseen Servant
spells.effect: Create an invisible, mindless, shapeless force. It can perform simple tasks (fetch, clean, light torches, trigger traps). It has AC 10, 1 HP, and Strength 2. It cannot attack.

spells.name: Summon Lesser Demon
spells.effect: Summon a Quasit or Dretch. Stats: 15 HP, AC 11, Attack +4 (1d6+2 damage). It acts on your turn. If you lose Concentration, the demon does not disappear but becomes hostile and attacks the nearest non-demon.

spells.name: Planar Binding
spells.effect: Target one Extraplanar creature (Elemental, Fiend, Fey). Casting Check vs. Will Save. Success: The creature is Paralyzed by spectral chains. If it takes damage, the chains break, but it remains Slowed (Half Speed) for the duration.

talents.name: Rite of the Flesh
talents.description: Warping the body to survive the unnatural.

spells.name: False Life
spells.effect: Action. You bolster your vitality with necrotic energy. You gain 1d4 + 4 Temporary Hit Points. While you have these Temp HP, you have Advantage on checks to resist Poison.

spells.name: Spider Climb
spells.effect: Action. A willing creature gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free. It gains a Climb Speed equal to its walking speed.

spells.name: Gaseous Form
spells.effect: Action. You transform into a misty cloud. You have a Fly Speed of 10ft and Resistance to non-magical damage. You can pass through small cracks. You cannot attack or cast spells.

talents.name: Rite of Passage
talents.description: Moving through the cracks in reality.

spells.name: Shadow Strider
spells.effect: Action. Your movement becomes a blur. Your Speed increases by 10ft, and opportunity attacks against you are made with Disadvantage.

spells.name: Misty Step
spells.effect: Bonus Action. You teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see. This allows you to escape Grapples or restraints instantly.

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.effect: Action. You teleport yourself and one willing creature of your size or smaller to a spot within range. You do not need to see the destination, but if you teleport into a solid object, you take 4d6 Force damage and the spell fails.

talents.name: Rite of Secrets
talents.description: Extracting truth from the unwilling or the unseen.

spells.name: Comprehend Languages
spells.effect: Action. You understand the literal meaning of any spoken language you hear. You can also read any written language you can touch.

spells.name: Detect Thoughts
spells.effect: Action. You focus on a creature. If they fail a Will Save vs. your Casting Check, you read their surface thoughts (what is foremost on their mind). As an Action, you can probe deeper, forcing another Save. Fail: You gain specific info, but they know you are probing.

spells.name: Contact Entity
spells.effect: Ritual (1 Turn). You mentally contact a demi-god, demon, or alien spirit. Ask one question. The GM answers truthfully (cryptically). Cost: You must make a Will Save (DC 15). Fail: You take 3d6 Psychic Damage and are Confused for 1 minute.

talents.name: Rite of Deceit
talents.description: Masks, lies, and silence.

spells.name: Disguise Self
spells.effect: Action. You make yourself look different (including clothing/armor). You can appear 1 foot shorter or taller. A creature can discern it is an illusion with a successful Scrutiny Check vs. your Casting Result.

spells.name: Silence
spells.effect: Action. Create a 20ft Radius sphere of absolute silence. No sound can pass through. Creatures inside cannot cast spells with Verbal components and are immune to Thunder damage.

spells.name: Mislead
spells.effect: Action. You become Invisible. At the same time, an illusory double of you appears where you stood. You can use your Action to move the double and make it speak. The invisibility ends if you attack or cast a spell.

talents.name: Blood Price
talents.effect: Free Action: When casting a spell, you can pay the MP cost with Health instead. You take 2 Damage for every 1 MP you replace. This damage cannot be reduced or prevented.
talents.details: Cast even when tapped out, if you dare.

talents.name: Dark Bargain
talents.effect: Free Action: Declare before casting. You gain Advantage on the Casting Check. The Cost: If you roll a Natural 1 on EITHER die, you trigger a Magic Mishap immediately.
talents.details: Doubles your crit chance, but doubles your fumble chance.

talents.name: Consume Soul
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when a creature dies within 30ft of you. Effect: You rip its soul free and regain 1d4 MP. Usable once per combat.
talents.details: Keeps your mana pool flowing in long fights.

talents.name: Chaotic Power
talents.effect: When you roll damage for a spell, add your CHA Modifier to the total.
talents.details: Raw force of personality drives your magic.

talents.name: Dark Focus
talents.effect: You gain a permanent +1 Bonus to all Casting Checks.
talents.details: Your pact guides your hand.

talents.name: Pact Magic
talents.effect: Your Maximum MP increases by 2.

talents.name: Forbidden Knowledge
talents.effect: Choose one Trained Skill (Lore, Intimidation, Deception). You become Expert (d6) in that skill.

talents.name: Potent Curses
talents.effect: When a creature fails a Saving Throw against one of your spells that inflicts a Condition (e.g., Fear, Blindness), they also take 1d6 Psychic Damage.
talents.details: Adds bite to your crowd control.

archetypes.name: The Priest
archetypes.description: A conduit for divine power. You are the anchor of the party, providing healing, protection, and radiant judgment. You do not just pray; you demand miracles.

talents.name: Liturgy of Life
talents.description: Prayers that knit flesh and restore vitality.

spells.name: Healing Word
spells.effect: Action. Make a Casting Check. Success: A living creature you can see regains 1d4 + WIS Mod Hit Points. Effective for stabilizing dying allies at range.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.effect: Action. You lay hands on a creature. Make a Casting Check. Success: The target regains 2d8 + WIS Mod Hit Points. If the target is Prone or Unconscious, they can stand up immediately.

spells.name: Mass Healing Word
spells.effect: Action. You speak a word of reprieve. Up to 4 creatures within range regain 1d8 + WIS Mod Hit Points. Undead and Constructs are unaffected.

talents.name: Liturgy of Light
talents.description: Calling down the burning judgment of the heavens.

spells.name: Sacred Flame
spells.effect: Action. Target one creature. Make a Casting Check vs. their Reflex Save. Success: Deal 1d8 Radiant Damage. This damage ignores Cover.

spells.name: Guiding Bolt
spells.effect: Action. Make a Ranged Casting Check vs. Defense. On Hit: Deal 3d6 Radiant Damage. The next Attack Check made against this target by you or an ally has Advantage.

spells.name: Sunbeam
spells.effect: Action. A beam of brilliant light flashes out (5ft wide). Creatures in the line make a Fortitude Save vs. Casting Result. Fail: 4d8 Radiant Damage and Blinded for 1 round. Success: Half damage.

talents.name: Liturgy of the Guardian
talents.description: Shielding the faithful from harm.

spells.name: Shield of Faith
spells.effect: Action. One creature gains a shimmering field. Their Armor Score (AS) increases by +1. This stacks with worn armor and shields.

spells.name: Sanctuary
spells.effect: Action. Ward a creature. Any enemy attempting to attack them must make a Will Save vs. Casting Result. On a failure, they lose the attack or must choose a new target. Ends if the warded creature makes an attack or casts a spell.

spells.name: Circle of Power
spells.effect: Action. Holy energy radiates from you. You and all allies in the aura have Advantage on Saving Throws against Spells and Magical Effects. If a spell deals half damage on a save, it deals no damage instead.

talents.name: Liturgy of War
talents.description: Blessings for the front lines.

spells.name: Bless
spells.effect: Action. Choose up to 3 allies. Whenever they make an Attack Check or Saving Throw, they add +1 to the result.

spells.name: Spiritual Weapon
spells.effect: Action. You create a floating spectral weapon. When you cast it, and as a Bonus Action on subsequent turns, you can make a Melee Spell Attack against a creature within 5ft of the weapon. On Hit: Deal 1d8 + WIS Mod Force Damage.

spells.name: Crusader's Mantle
spells.effect: Action. Holy power radiates from you. Allies in the aura deal an additional 1d4 Radiant Damage on all weapon attacks.

talents.name: Liturgy of Cleansing
talents.description: Purifying the body and soul of corruption.

spells.name: Purify Food and Drink
spells.effect: Action. All non-magical food and drink within a 5-foot-radius sphere is purified and rendered free of poison and disease. Useful for scavenging in dungeons.

spells.name: Lesser Restoration
spells.effect: Action. You touch a creature and end one Condition afflicting it: Blinded, Deafened, Paralyzed, or Poisoned. It does not cure magical Curses.

spells.name: Remove Curse
spells.effect: Action. You touch a creature or object. All curses affecting it end. If the object is a Cursed Magic Item, it remains cursed, but the owner can safely discard or unequip it.

talents.name: Liturgy of Exorcism
talents.description: Driving back the unquiet dead and fiends.

spells.name: Turn Undead
spells.effect: Action. You present your holy symbol. All Undead within 30ft must make a Will Save vs. Casting Result. Fail: They are Frightened and must spend their turns fleeing from you. If the Undead has 1 HP (Minion), it is destroyed instantly.

spells.name: Hallow
spells.effect: Ritual (1 Turn). You ward an area (20ft Radius). Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead cannot enter the area. Creatures inside cannot be Charmed, Frightened, or Possessed.

spells.name: Dispel Evil
spells.effect: Action. Make a Melee Casting Check against a creature. If it is Possessed or Charmed, the effect ends. If it is a summoned creature (from another plane), it must make a Will Save vs. your Check or be sent back to its home plane.

talents.name: Liturgy of Providence
talents.description: Seeking guidance from higher powers.

spells.name: Guidance
spells.effect: Action. You touch a willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one Ability Check or Saving Throw of its choice.

spells.name: Augury
spells.effect: Ritual (1 Turn). You receive an omen from an otherworldly entity about the results of a specific course of action that you plan to take within the next 30 minutes. GM replies: Weal (Good), Woe (Bad), or Mixed.

spells.name: Commune
spells.effect: Ritual (1 Turn). You contact your deity or a divine proxy. You may ask up to three yes or no questions. You must receive a truthful answer, though powerful magic may hide the truth.

talents.name: Liturgy of the Spirit
talents.description: Conjuring spiritual guardians to control the battlefield.

spells.name: Thaumaturgy
spells.effect: Action. You manifest a minor wonder: boom your voice, cause flames to flicker, create harmless tremors, or cause an unlocked door to fly open. Grants Advantage on Intimidation checks.

spells.name: Spirit Guardians
spells.effect: Action. Spectral spirits flit around you. Enemies treat the area as Difficult Terrain. An enemy starting its turn in the area takes 2d8 Radiant or Necrotic damage (Wisdom Save vs. Result for half).

spells.name: Guardian of Faith
spells.effect: Action. A Large, IMMOBILE spectral guardian appears in an unoccupied space. Any enemy that moves within 10ft of it takes 2d8 Radiant damage (Dexterity Save vs. Result for half). The guardian vanishes after dealing 60 damage total.

talents.name: Liturgy of Zeal
talents.description: Burning the wicked with divine wrath.

spells.name: Word of Radiance
spells.effect: Action. You utter a burning word. All enemies within 5 feet of you must make a Fortitude Save vs. Casting Result. Fail: They take 1d6 Radiant damage.

spells.name: Blindness / Deafness
spells.effect: Action. Target one creature. Make a Casting Check vs. their Fortitude Save. Success: The target is Blinded or Deafened (your choice). They can repeat the save at the end of each of their turns.

spells.name: Flame Strike
spells.effect: Action. A vertical column of divine fire roars down. 10ft Radius, 40ft High Cylinder. Creatures inside take 2d6 Fire damage AND 2d6 Radiant damage (4d6 total). Reflex Save vs. Casting Result for half.

talents.name: Liturgy of Dominion
talents.description: Compelling others to obey divine law.

spells.name: Command
spells.effect: Action. You speak a one-word command to a creature (e.g., 'Halt', 'Drop', 'Flee'). Target makes a Will Save vs. Casting Result. Fail: They must follow the command on their next turn. Does not work if the command is directly self-harming.

spells.name: Zone of Truth
spells.effect: Action. You create a 15ft Radius sphere. Creatures inside must make a Will Save. Fail: They cannot speak a deliberate lie. You know whether they passed or failed the save.

spells.name: Geas
spells.effect: 1 Minute Cast (Ritual). You place a magical command on a creature to carry out a service or refrain from an action. Will Save vs. Casting Result. Fail: They are Charmed. If they act counter to your instructions, they take 5d10 Psychic damage (once per day).

talents.name: Liturgy of Fortitude
talents.description: Strengthening the body against adversity.

spells.name: Aid
spells.effect: Action. Choose up to 3 creatures. Their Maximum Hit Points increase by 5 for the duration. (This stacks with Temporary HP).

spells.name: Enhance Ability
spells.effect: Action. Choose one Attribute (STR, DEX, etc.). The target has Advantage on all Checks made with that Attribute. (Does not apply to Attacks or Saves, only Ability Checks like Athletics or Stealth).

spells.name: Protection from Energy
spells.effect: Action. Choose Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. The willing creature gains Resistance (Half Damage) to that damage type.

talents.name: Liturgy of Sustenance
talents.description: Overcoming the hazards of the wild.

spells.name: Create Food and Water
spells.effect: Action. You create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water. Enough to sustain up to 15 humanoids or 5 steeds for 24 hours. Prevents Exhaustion from hunger.

spells.name: Water Walk
spells.effect: Ritual (1 Turn). Up to 10 willing creatures gain the ability to move across any liquid surface (water, acid, mud, quicksand) as if it were harmless solid ground.

spells.name: Meld into Stone
spells.effect: Action. You step into a stone object or surface large enough to contain you. You are invisible and cannot be targeted, but cannot see outside. You can hear faintly. Useful for safe Short/Long Rests in dungeons.

talents.name: Prayer of Solace
talents.effect: Action: You recite a prayer of renewal. Regain 1d4 Mana Points (MP). Usable once per Long Rest.
talents.details: Ensures you have magic for the final boss.

talents.name: Divine Warding
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when an ally within 30ft fails a Saving Throw against a magical effect (e.g., Charm, Fear, Hex). Effect: Grant them an immediate Re-roll with Advantage.
talents.details: Can prevent a party wipe from crowd control.

talents.name: Radiant Potency
talents.effect: When you roll damage for a Spell, add your WIS Modifier to the total.
talents.details: Boosts your offensive prayers.

talents.name: Divine Focus
talents.effect: You gain a permanent +1 Bonus to all Casting Checks.
talents.details: Reduces the chance of fizzling a heal.

talents.name: Divine Will
talents.effect: Your Maximum Mana (MP) increases by 2.

talents.name: Theological Studies
talents.effect: Choose one Trained Skill (Lore, Scrutiny, Medicine). You become Expert (d6) in that skill.

talents.name: Blessed Healer
talents.effect: When you cast a spell that restores HP, you can re-roll any 1s on the dice. You must use the new result.
talents.details: Makes healing more consistent.

talents.name: Divine Alacrity
talents.effect: You can cast any Priest Spell with a base cost of 1 MP as a Move Action instead of a Standard Action.
talents.details: Allows you to Heal and Attack/Dash in the same turn.

archetypes.name: The Primalist
archetypes.description: The avatar of nature's fury. You are not a servant of the wild; you are the storm, the earthquake, and the beast. You shift forms to tear enemies apart or reshape the battlefield with elemental force.

talents.name: Aspect of the Volcano
talents.description: Channeling the molten fury of the earth's core.

spells.name: Produce Flame
spells.effect: Action. A flame appears in your hand (Light source). You can hurl it (Ranged Casting Check vs Defense) to deal 1d8 Fire damage. Throwing it ends the spell immediately.

spells.name: Heat Metal
spells.effect: Action. Target a metal object (weapon/armor). Any creature touching it takes 2d8 Fire damage. If holding it, they must make a Constitution Save or drop it. If wearing it, they take damage automatically and have Disadvantage on Attacks.

spells.name: Form of Living Magma
spells.effect: Action. You transform into molten rock. 1. You gain Resistance to Physical Damage and Immunity to Fire. 2. Any creature that touches you or hits you with a melee attack takes 1d6 Fire damage. 3. Your melee attacks deal Fire damage.

talents.name: Aspect of the Mountain
talents.description: Embodying the unyielding endurance of stone.

spells.name: Magic Stone
spells.effect: Bonus Action. You imbue 3 pebbles with magic. You or an ally can throw them (Range 60ft) using a Ranged Attack Check (WIS based). On Hit: Deal 1d6 + WIS Mod Bludgeoning damage (Magical).

spells.name: Earthbind
spells.effect: Action. Target one creature. Make a Casting Check vs. Strength Save. Fail: The target's Fly Speed becomes 0. It falls gently to the ground (60ft per round) and cannot fly for the duration.

spells.name: Form of Living Stone
spells.effect: Action. Your skin becomes granite. 1. You gain +2 Armor Score (Stacks with Shield). 2. You cannot be Knocked Prone or moved against your will. 3. Siege Monster: Your melee attacks deal Double Damage to objects.

talents.name: Aspect of the Storm
talents.description: Harnessing the speed and violence of the gale.

spells.name: Thunderclap
spells.effect: Action. Creates a burst of sound. All creatures within 5 feet must make a Fortitude Save vs. Casting Result. Fail: Take 1d6 Thunder damage and are pushed 5 feet away.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.effect: Action. Create a wall of wind (50ft long, 15ft high). Arrows and bolts cannot pass through it (miss automatically). Creatures passing through must make a Strength Save vs. Casting Result or be pushed back.

spells.name: Form of Living Air
spells.effect: Action. You dissolve into a whirlwind. 1. You gain a Fly Speed of 40ft (Hover). 2. Ranged Attacks against you have Disadvantage. 3. You can move through enemy spaces without provoking counter-attacks.

talents.name: Aspect of the Tide
talents.description: Using the crushing weight and fluidity of water.

spells.name: Ice Shard
spells.effect: Action. Ranged Casting Check vs Defense. On Hit: Deal 1d8 Cold damage. This attack ignores 1 point of Armor Score (Piercing).

spells.name: Tidal Crash
spells.effect: Action. A wave crashes from your hands. Creatures in the area make a Reflex Save vs. Casting Result. Fail: Take 2d6 Bludgeoning damage and are Knocked Prone. Success: Half damage.

spells.name: Form of Living Water
spells.effect: Action. You become liquid. 1. You gain Resistance to non-magical physical damage. 2. You can squeeze through 1-inch gaps without slowing. 3. Your melee reach increases by 5ft (Lashing water).

talents.name: Aspect of the Grove
talents.description: The crushing inevitability of roots and thorns.

spells.name: Thorn Whip
spells.effect: Action. Make a Melee Casting Check (Reach 30ft). On Hit: Deal 1d6 Piercing damage and pull the target 10 feet closer to you.

spells.name: Entangle
spells.effect: Action. Target a 15ft Square. Weeds and vines burst from the ground. The area is Difficult Terrain. Creatures in the area must make a Reflex Save vs. Casting Result or be Restrained.

spells.name: Form of the Iron-Oak
spells.effect: Action. Your skin becomes bark. 1. Your Armor Score becomes 3 (Natural Armor). 2. Your Melee Reach increases by 5ft. 3. Rooted: You cannot be knocked Prone or moved against your will.

talents.name: Aspect of the Swarm
talents.description: A thousand tiny bites working as one.

spells.name: Infestation
spells.effect: Action. Target one creature. Make a Casting Check vs. Fortitude Save. Fail: Take 1d6 Poison damage and the target moves 5 feet in a random direction (d4: N, S, E, W).

spells.name: Cloak of Flies
spells.effect: Action. An aura of buzzing insects surrounds you (5ft Radius). You gain Advantage on Intimidation checks. Any creature that starts its turn in the aura takes 1d4 Poison damage automatically.

spells.name: Form of the Hive
spells.effect: Action. You dissolve into a swarm of beetles/wasps. 1. You gain Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage. 2. You can occupy another creature's space. 3. Vulnerability: You take Double Damage from Area of Effect (AoE) attacks.

talents.name: Aspect of the Serpent
talents.description: The silent strike and the crushing coil.

spells.name: Venom Spit
spells.effect: Action. Ranged Casting Check vs Defense. On Hit: Deal 1d8 Poison damage. If the target is Poisoned, deal 1d12 instead.

spells.name: Noxious Breath
spells.effect: Action. You exhale green gas. Creatures in the cone make a Fortitude Save vs. Casting Result. Fail: 2d6 Poison damage and Sickened (Disadvantage on Attack Checks) for 1 round. Success: Half damage.

spells.name: Form of the Giant Snake
spells.effect: Action. You elongate and grow scales. 1. You gain a Climb Speed of 30ft. 2. Constrict: When you hit with a melee attack (1d8 dmg), the target is automatically Grappled (Escape DC 15). 3. You have Advantage on attacks against Grappled targets.

talents.name: Aspect of the Raptor
talents.description: The speed and ferocity of the ancient dinosaurs.

spells.name: Primal Strike
spells.effect: Action. Your hand becomes a claw or talon momentarily. Make a Melee Casting Check. On Hit: Deal 1d10 Slashing damage.

spells.name: Pass Without Trace
spells.effect: Action. Shadows and silence follow you. You and all allies within 30ft gain a +5 Bonus to Stealth checks and leave no physical tracks.

spells.name: Form of the Dread-Saur
spells.effect: Action. You become a bipedal lizard predator. 1. Your Speed increases by 10ft. 2. Pack Tactics: You have Advantage on attacks if an ally is adjacent to your target. 3. Pounce: If you move 20ft straight toward a target and hit, they are knocked Prone.

talents.name: Aspect of Decay
talents.description: The inevitable return to the soil.

spells.name: Wither
spells.effect: Action. Make a Melee Casting Check. On Hit: Deal 1d10 Necrotic damage. Plants and Water Elementals take maximum damage. The target cannot regain Hit Points until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Blight
spells.effect: Action. You draw moisture from a living creature. Casting Check vs. Fortitude Save. Fail: Take 4d8 Necrotic damage. Success: Half damage. Undead and Constructs are immune.

spells.name: Form of the Myconid
spells.effect: Action. You become a fungal giant. 1. You emit a 10ft aura of spores. Any creature starting its turn there takes 1d6 Poison damage. 2. You can use a Bonus Action to corpse-explode a dead body within 15ft for 2d6 damage to adjacent enemies.

talents.name: Aspect of the Moon
talents.description: The silver light that reveals truth and madness.

spells.name: Faerie Fire
spells.effect: Action. 20ft Cube. Creatures in the area must make a Reflex Save vs. Casting Result. Fail: They glow with pale light. Attacks against them have Advantage, and they cannot benefit from Invisibility.

spells.name: Moonbeam
spells.effect: Action. Create a 5ft Radius cylinder of pale light. Creatures entering or starting their turn inside take 2d10 Radiant damage (Fortitude Save for half). Shapeshifters have Disadvantage on the save and revert to original form on failure.

spells.name: Form of the Moon-Beast
spells.effect: Action. You transform into a snowy Owlbear-like creature. 1. You gain 20 Temporary HP. 2. You gain Darkvision 60ft. 3. Your Unarmed Strike deals 1d10+2 damage and you have Advantage on Perception checks.

talents.name: Aspect of Vitality
talents.description: The burgeoning growth of spring.

spells.name: Regrowth
spells.effect: Action. Touch a living creature. They regain 1d4 Hit Points and gain 1d4 Temporary Hit Points. Useful for keeping allies on their feet.

spells.name: Protection from Poison
spells.effect: Action. Touch a creature. Cures one Poison effect currently affecting them. For the next hour, they have Resistance to Poison damage and Advantage on saves against being Poisoned.

spells.name: Form of the Spring Spirit
spells.effect: Action. You become a being of vines and light. 1. Aura of Life: You and allies within 10ft regain 1d4 HP at the start of your turn. 2. You are Immune to Necrotic damage. 3. You can move through plants without slowing.

talents.name: Aspect of the Cavern
talents.description: Adaptation to the deep dark.

spells.name: Echoing Strike
spells.effect: Action. Ranged Casting Check. On Hit: Deal 1d8 Thunder damage. The sound reverberates, revealing the target's location if Hidden or Invisible.

spells.name: Darkvision
spells.effect: Action. A willing creature gains the ability to see in total darkness up to 60 feet. The vision is in black and white.

spells.name: Form of the Giant Bat
spells.effect: Action. You transform into a Large bat-monster. 1. You gain a Fly Speed of 40ft. 2. You gain Blindsight 30ft (Blind but can 'see' via sound). 3. Your bite deals 1d8 Piercing and heals you for half the damage dealt.

talents.name: Primal Recovery
talents.effect: Action: Meditate on the land. Regain 1d4 Mana Points (MP). Usable once per Long Rest.
talents.details: Sustain your magic over a long day.

talents.name: Primal Attunement
talents.effect: Action: Open your senses for 1 minute. You have Advantage on Scrutiny and Survival checks. You automatically sense the location of all living creatures within 30ft. Usable once per Long Rest.
talents.details: Detect ambushes and invisible foes.

talents.name: Speak with Animals
talents.effect: Action: You can speak with and understand natural beasts for 10 minutes. They are not compelled to help, but are generally neutral.
talents.details: Gather intel from rats and birds.

talents.name: Beast Sense
talents.effect: Action: Touch a willing beast (or your companion). For 1 hour, you can use your Action to see through its eyes and hear what it hears. You are blind/deaf to your own surroundings while doing so.
talents.details: Safe scouting.

talents.name: Primal Potency
talents.effect: When you roll damage for a Spell, add your WIS Modifier to the total.
talents.details: Boosts damage of spells and transformed attacks.

talents.name: Primal Focus
talents.effect: You gain a permanent +1 Bonus to all Casting Checks.
talents.details: Consistency in magic.

talents.name: Primal Heart
talents.effect: Your Maximum MP increases by 2.

talents.name: Child of the Wild
talents.effect: You ignore non-magical Difficult Terrain (vines, rubble, mud). You have Advantage on Survival checks in nature.
talents.details: Mobility supremacy outdoors.

classes.name: Weapon Master
classes.description: The pinnacle of martial discipline. You see the battlefield as an equation and solve it with steel. You adapt your attacks to bypass defenses and exploit every mistake.

synergy_feats.name: Combat Superiority
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You hit a creature with a Weapon Attack. Effect: Apply a tactical maneuver. Choose One: 1. Trip: Target is Knocked Prone. 2. Disarm: Target drops one held item. 3. Precision: Deal an additional +1d6 Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Flash of Insight
synergy_feats.effect: You analyze the enemy's guard to find a fatal flaw. Make a Weapon Attack. On a Hit: Deal Normal Damage, and the target gains Vulnerability to the next source of damage it takes (Double Damage). This effect ends at the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Perfect Execution
synergy_feats.effect: You deliver the perfect strike. Make a single Weapon Attack. Treat the d20 roll as a Natural 20 (Automatic Critical). Deal Critical Damage. The target must make a Fortitude Save vs the Damage Dealt or be Stunned for 1 round.

classes.name: Conqueror
classes.description: A disciplined warlord and shock trooper. You apply overwhelming force with precision, shattering armor and terrifying foes to create openings for your squad.

synergy_feats.name: Heavy Impact
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You hit a creature with a Melee Attack. Effect: You put your entire mass into the blow. The target must make a Strength Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: They are Pushed 10 feet away and Knocked Prone. If they hit a wall or object, they take an additional 1d6 Bludgeoning Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Subjugate
synergy_feats.effect: You brutally pin an enemy. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Normal Damage and the target is Restrained (Speed 0, Disadvantage on DEX Saves). At the start of each of your turns, if you are still adjacent to the Restrained target, they take automatic Bludgeoning damage equal to your STR Modifier.

synergy_feats.name: Juggernaut
synergy_feats.effect: You become an unstoppable force for 1 minute. 1. You gain Resistance to Non-Magical Physical Damage. 2. You are Immune to Stunned, Prone, and Forced Movement. 3. Your melee attacks deal an additional +1d8 Damage.

classes.name: Knight
classes.description: The armored bastion of order. You lead from the front, challenging the strongest foes to single combat and providing a mobile fortress for your allies.

synergy_feats.name: Knight's Challenge
synergy_feats.effect: You demand an enemy's attention. Target one creature within 30 feet. Make an Intimidation or Athletics Check vs their Will Save. Success: The target is Challenged (1 min). They have Disadvantage on attacks against targets other than you. If they attack anyone else while within your Reach, you may make a Free Attack against them.

synergy_feats.name: Intervention
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An ally within 30 feet is hit by an attack. Effect: You move up to your Speed to a space adjacent to the ally. You take the hit instead. Your Armor Score counts as Double against this specific attack.

synergy_feats.name: Ironclad Bulwark
synergy_feats.effect: You become an avatar of defense for 1 minute. 1. You gain Resistance to all Physical Damage. 2. You cannot be Knocked Prone or Moved against your will. 3. You gain one additional Reaction per round (specifically for Block or Parry).

classes.name: Swashbuckler
classes.description: A blur of charismatic confidence and flashing steel. You treat combat as a high-stakes game, feinting to create openings and punishing enemies who are too slow to hit you.

synergy_feats.name: Dazzling Flourish
synergy_feats.effect: You combine a feint with a dirty trick. Make a Weapon Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Normal Damage and apply a penalty. Choose One: 1. Disarm: Target drops one item. 2. Blind: Target is Blinded (sand/cape) until the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Grand Riposte
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An enemy misses you with a Melee Attack (or you Parry/Dodge it). Effect: You make an immediate Counter-Attack against them. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d8 Precision Damage. You may then shift 5 feet to any unoccupied space without provoking counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Steel Hurricane
synergy_feats.effect: You become a blur of motion. Move up to your Full Speed (ignoring counter-attacks and passing through enemies). You may make one Melee Attack against EVERY enemy you pass adjacent to during this move. Each attack deals Normal Damage. You cannot attack the same target twice.

classes.name: Berserker
classes.description: A force of nature fueled by pain and adrenaline. You trade defense for pure offense, shrugging off wounds that would kill a lesser warrior to deliver devastating punishment.

synergy_feats.name: Frenzy
synergy_feats.effect: You enter a battle rage for 1 minute. 1. You gain Resistance (Half Damage) to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage. 2. You deal +2 Damage on all Melee Attacks. Drawback: While Frenzied, enemies have Advantage on Attack Checks against you.

synergy_feats.name: Savage Reprisal
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You take damage from a creature within your Reach. Effect: You immediately make a Melee Attack against them. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus additional damage equal to your CON Modifier. You regain Hit Points equal to the additional damage dealt.

synergy_feats.name: Undying Juggernaut
synergy_feats.effect: You refuse to die. For 1 minute: 1. You are Immune to Charmed, Frightened, and Stunned. 2. If you are reduced to 0 HP, you do not fall Unconscious. You continue fighting. You still make Death Saves each turn. If you have 3 Failures when this effect ends, you die.

classes.name: Bulwark
classes.description: A living fortress of muscle and steel. You hold the line not just with a shield, but with terrifying mass, shrugging off blows and shattering the ground beneath your enemies.

synergy_feats.name: Reactive Plating
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You take Physical Damage. Effect: You angle your armor to absorb the blow. Reduce the damage by 1d10 + CON Modifier. If the damage is reduced to 0, the attacker is jarred by the impact and becomes Dazed (Action OR Move only) until the start of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Shockwave
synergy_feats.effect: You slam the ground with earth-shattering force. All creatures within a 15-foot radius (except you) must make a Reflex Save vs your Athletics Check. Fail: They take 2d6 Bludgeoning Damage and are Knocked Prone. The area becomes Difficult Terrain (rubble) for the rest of the encounter.

synergy_feats.name: Walking Fortress
synergy_feats.effect: You enter a defensive stance for 1 minute. 1. You gain Resistance to ALL Damage (Half Damage). 2. You are Immune to being Knocked Prone or Moved against your will. 3. You provide Total Cover to any ally standing directly behind you or in your space.

classes.name: Gladiator
classes.description: A master of spectacle and violence. You blend raw power with surprising speed, vaulting across the battlefield to hurl enemies into hazards and turn combat into a bloody performance.

synergy_feats.name: Vaulting Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You use momentum to crush a foe. Move up to your Speed. You can jump over creatures and obstacles during this move. At the end, make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage + 1d6. The target must make a Reflex Save vs your Attack Roll or be Knocked Prone.

synergy_feats.name: Hurl Foe
synergy_feats.effect: You physically throw one enemy into another. Choose a creature adjacent to you (size Large or smaller). Make an Athletics Check vs their Fortitude Save. Success: You throw them up to 20 feet. They take 2d6 Bludgeoning Damage and land Prone. If they hit another creature, that creature also takes 2d6 Damage and must Save vs Reflex or fall Prone.

synergy_feats.name: Arena Champion
synergy_feats.effect: You enter a state of bloody flow for 1 minute. 1. Your Speed increases by 10 feet. 2. Your Critical Hit range expands to 18-20. 3. Blood Sport: Whenever you score a Critical Hit or reduce an enemy to 0 HP, you immediately regain 1 Stamina.

classes.name: Aegis
classes.description: The immovable object. A selfless protector who finds glory in defense, creating a zone of safety for allies with an iron will and absolute endurance.

synergy_feats.name: Shield Wall
synergy_feats.effect: You enter a defensive stance until the start of your next turn. 1. You and all adjacent allies gain a +2 Bonus to Defense Checks. 2. You and adjacent allies cannot be Flanked. 3. You cannot be Knocked Prone or Moved against your will.

synergy_feats.name: Punishing Block
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You use the Block Action (Defense). Effect: You gain Advantage on the Block Check. If the Block is successful (you take 0 damage), you immediately Shield Bash the attacker. They take 1d6 + STR Bludgeoning Damage and are Dazed (Action OR Move only) until the end of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Avatar of Iron
synergy_feats.effect: You become a living fortress for 1 minute. 1. Your Armor Score increases by +2. 2. You gain Resistance to Damage from Spells. 3. You Regenerate 5 Hit Points at the start of each of your turns.

classes.name: Lancer
classes.description: The swift protector. A mobile bastion who uses speed to intercept attacks and heavy armor to crash through enemy lines like a living battering ram.

synergy_feats.name: Intercepting Vault
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An enemy within 30 feet moves or attacks an ally. Effect: You launch yourself to an unoccupied space adjacent to that enemy (No Opportunity Attacks). Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Normal Damage and the enemy's Speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

synergy_feats.name: Break the Line
synergy_feats.effect: You charge through the enemy formation. Move up to your Speed in a straight line. You can move through enemy spaces. Each enemy you pass through must make a Reflex Save vs your Athletics/Acrobatics Check. Fail: They take 2d6 Bludgeoning Damage and are Knocked Prone. You gain +2 Defense until your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Comet Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You leap into the air and crash down. Jump up to 40 feet to a space you can see (ignoring obstacles). Make a Melee Attack against a target in that space. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). Shockwave: All *other* creatures within 10 feet must make a Fortitude Save or be Knocked Prone.

classes.name: Blade-Dancer
classes.description: A warrior-artist. Combat is a performance, a blur of motion and steel. You dodge lethal blows by a hair and deliver a flurry of strikes faster than the eye can follow.

synergy_feats.name: Waltz of Steel
synergy_feats.effect: You flow across the battlefield. Make Two Weapon Attacks. You may move up to 15 feet before, between, or after these attacks. This movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Evasive Trance
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You are targeted by an Attack. Effect: You enter a state of heightened perception. The attack automatically Misses. You may immediately shift 10 feet to an unoccupied space.

synergy_feats.name: Storm of Blades
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash your ultimate technique. Make Three Weapon Attacks against any targets within reach. All attacks are made with Advantage. For this turn, your Critical Hit range is 18-20.

classes.name: Thief
classes.description: The master of the impossible. You bypass traps that aren't there, steal words before they are spoken, and vanish in plain sight. For you, locks are suggestions and property is fluid.

synergy_feats.name: Combat Mugging
synergy_feats.effect: You rob a target while striking them. Make a Weapon Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Normal Damage. Additionally, you either Disarm the target (item drops) or steal one exposed item (potion, pouch, key) from them. You immediately stash the stolen item.

synergy_feats.name: Professional Standards
synergy_feats.effect: You do not fail at simple tasks. Whenever you make a Dexterity or Charisma Skill Check (e.g., Stealth, Deception, Lockpicking), treat any d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

synergy_feats.name: Phantom Heist
synergy_feats.effect: You become a ghost. For 1 minute, you are Invisible and Incorporeal (can move through walls/creatures). You take 0 damage from non-magical sources. If you Attack, the Invisibility ends, but that attack is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20).

classes.name: Bounty Hunter
classes.description: The ultimate pursuer. You combine urban cunning with wilderness survival to track, corner, and capture specific targets. You have a gadget for every escape attempt.

synergy_feats.name: Dead or Alive
synergy_feats.effect: You deploy a bola, net, or dirty trick to halt a target. Make a Weapon Attack. On a Hit: Deal Normal Damage. The target must make a Strength Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: They are Restrained (Speed 0, Disadvantage on DEX Saves). They can repeat the save as an Action to escape.

synergy_feats.name: Relentless Pursuit
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An enemy within 60 feet moves more than 5 feet away from you. Effect: You immediately move up to your Speed towards them. If you end this movement adjacent to them, you may make a single Melee Attack. This movement ignores Difficult Terrain.

synergy_feats.name: The Contract
synergy_feats.effect: You designate a target as your Quarry for 1 minute. 1. You have Truesight vs the Quarry (Ignore Invisibility/Illusions). 2. Your attacks against them ignore Armor Score. 3. Payout: If you reduce the Quarry to 0 HP, you immediately regain 2 Luck Points.

classes.name: Spy
classes.description: A mastermind of secrets and social manipulation. You infiltrate perceptions, turn enemies into puppets, and reveal fatal weaknesses for your allies to exploit.

synergy_feats.name: Incite Betrayal
synergy_feats.effect: You trick an enemy into striking their ally. Target one enemy. Make a Deception Check vs their Will Save Value. Success: The target immediately uses their Reaction to make a single Weapon Attack against a creature of your choice adjacent to them.

synergy_feats.name: Cold Reading
synergy_feats.effect: You analyze a target's posture and tells. Target one creature. 1. You learn their current HP and one Immunity/Resistance. 2. You expose a gap in their guard: Until the start of your next turn, all attacks made by you and your allies against this target have Advantage.

synergy_feats.name: Sleeper Agent
synergy_feats.effect: You speak a trigger phrase. Target one humanoid who can hear you. Make an Influence Check vs their Will Save Value. Success: The target is Dominated for 1 minute. They obey your mental commands. The effect ends early if the target takes damage from you or your allies.

classes.name: Alchemist
classes.description: A deadly chemist who blends stealth with volatile science. You deliver toxins with surgical precision, turn blood into acid, and control the battlefield with clouds of death and life.

synergy_feats.name: Surgical Delivery
synergy_feats.effect: You inject a chemical directly into a vital point. Consume 1 Reagent (e.g., Poison, Acid). Make a Weapon Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage and the Reagent is applied automatically (No contest roll required). The target suffers the full effect immediately.

synergy_feats.name: Toxic Shock
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: A creature takes Acid, Fire, or Poison damage. Effect: You exploit the pain to overwhelm their system. Make an Intelligence or Dexterity Check against the target's Fortitude Save Value. Success: The target is Stunned until the start of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Philosopher's Cloud
synergy_feats.effect: You shatter a masterwork vial. Choose a point within 60 feet. A 20-foot radius cloud appears for 1 minute. 1. Enemies in the cloud take 4d8 Damage (Type matches Reagent) at the start of their turn (No Defense roll). 2. Allies in the cloud regain 2d8 HP at the start of their turn. 3. The area is Heavily Obscured.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: The alpha of the pack. You are the trap and the arrow, fighting in perfect unison with a beast companion to bring down prey through coordination and overwhelming force.

synergy_feats.name: Coordinated Assault
synergy_feats.effect: You strike as one. Make a Weapon Attack against a target with Advantage. Simultaneously, your Beast Companion uses its Reaction to move up to its Speed and make an Attack against the same target. If both attacks hit, the target is Knocked Prone.

synergy_feats.name: Spirit Link
synergy_feats.effect: You and your beast share a vitality pool. 1. Whenever you or your beast takes damage, you can choose to split the damage evenly between both of you (preventing massive spikes). 2. Whenever you receive magical healing, your beast also regains HP equal to half the amount.

synergy_feats.name: Apex Predator
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash the full fury of the wild for 1 minute. 1. Both you and your Beast Companion have Advantage on ALL Attack Checks. 2. Your Beast's attacks deal +1d8 extra damage. 3. If either of you reduces an enemy to 0 HP, you immediately regain 1 Luck Point.

classes.name: Pathfinder
classes.description: The tactical mind of the hunt. You read the land like a map and coordinate your allies to strike with perfect timing, ensuring no terrain is too hostile and no enemy can hide.

synergy_feats.name: Pathfinder's Quarry
synergy_feats.effect: You highlight a target's vulnerabilities. Target one enemy within 60 feet. For 1 minute: 1. The target cannot Hide and gains no benefit from Cover. 2. Whenever an ally hits this target with a Weapon Attack, they deal an additional +1d4 Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Trailblazer
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An ally fails a Saving Throw against a Trap, Environmental Hazard, or Movement-impairing effect (e.g., Web, Grease). Effect: You shout a warning or lend a hand. The ally succeeds on the Save instead and may immediately move 10 feet.

synergy_feats.name: Coordinated Ambush
synergy_feats.effect: You signal a synchronized strike. Choose up to 3 allies within 30 feet. They immediately turn Invisible until the start of your next turn (or until they attack). They may use their Reaction to move up to their Speed. If they attack from this Invisibility, it deals +2d10 extra damage.

classes.name: Scavenger
classes.description: A master of improvisation. You see weapons in the mud and medicine in the moss. You build tools on the fly to solve any problem, turning trash into treasure in the heat of battle.

synergy_feats.name: Improvised Device
synergy_feats.effect: You cobble together a solution from debris. Create a temporary version of any Tier 1 Reagent (e.g., Acid, Salve, Smoke Bomb) or a mundane Tool (Crowbar, Rope). You do not spend Materials. The item lasts for 1 minute or until used, then falls apart.

synergy_feats.name: Reactive Snare
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An enemy enters a space adjacent to you. Effect: You instantly deploy a Trap Reagent (e.g., Caltrops, Snare, Grease) under their feet. The enemy has Disadvantage on the Saving Throw to resist the trap's effects.

synergy_feats.name: Shrapnel Nova
synergy_feats.effect: You detonate a reagent packed with scrap metal. Consume 1 Reagent. Choose a point within 30 feet. All creatures in a 20-foot radius take 4d8 Piercing Damage + The Reagent's Standard Effect. (Reflex Save for Half Damage/Negate Effect).

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: A virtuoso of morale. Your voice turns routs into victories. You inspire greatness, ensuring your allies fight harder, faster, and longer than they thought possible.

synergy_feats.name: Heroic Tale
synergy_feats.effect: You weave a narrative of victory for an ally. Target one ally within 30 feet. 1. They gain 1d8 Temporary Hit Points. 2. They gain Advantage on the very next d20 Check they make (Attack, Skill, or Save).

synergy_feats.name: Cutting Wit
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An enemy makes an attack roll. Effect: You shout a distraction or insult. Make an Influence Check vs their Will Save Value. Success: The enemy has Disadvantage on the attack. If the attack Misses, the enemy takes 2d6 Psychic Damage from humiliation.

synergy_feats.name: Legend Maker
synergy_feats.effect: You elevate an ally to legendary status. Target one willing ally. For 1 minute: 1. They are Immune to all Mental Conditions (Fear/Charm/Stun). 2. They roll 2d20 and keep the Highest for ALL Attacks and Saves (Permanent Advantage). 3. If they drop to 0 HP, they act normally until the effect ends.

classes.name: Merchant
classes.description: A master of logistics and investment. You make your allies stronger by equipping them with the best gear instantly and using your wealth to bribe or intimidate enemies into submission.

synergy_feats.name: Special Delivery
synergy_feats.effect: You toss a vital supply to the perfect spot. Consume 1 Reagent (e.g., Healing Salve, Bomb). Choose an ally within 30 feet. They catch the item and use it immediately as a Free Action. The item's numeric effects (Healing or Damage) are Maximized.

synergy_feats.name: Everyone Has a Price
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An intelligent enemy targets you with an attack. Effect: You make a counter-offer. Make an Influence Check vs their Will Save Value. Success: The attack is negated, and the enemy is Charmed by you until they take damage. You lose 1d6 Gold (the bribe).

synergy_feats.name: Hostile Takeover
synergy_feats.effect: You buy an enemy's loyalty. Target one humanoid with 30 feet. Make an Influence Check vs their Will Save Value. Success: The target is Dominated for 1 minute. They obey your commands. If they survive the fight, they flee. If they die, you find extra loot on them.

classes.name: Artisan
classes.description: The visionary inventor. You don't just follow recipes; you rewrite them. Your creations are more potent, more stable, and more devastating than anything bought in a shop.

synergy_feats.name: Volatile Infusion
synergy_feats.effect: You slap a temporary upgrade onto a weapon or armor. Consume 1 Reagent. For 1 minute: 1. Weapon: Deals +1d6 Damage (Type matches Reagent). 2. Armor: Wearer gains Resistance to the Reagent's type and +1 Armor Score. (Requires standard action to apply).

synergy_feats.name: Rapid Deployment
synergy_feats.effect: You use your gadgets with blinding speed. You may Use, Throw, or Drink **two** different Items/Reagents as a single Standard Action. You make separate Attack Rolls for each if required.

synergy_feats.name: Magnum Opus
synergy_feats.effect: You deploy a massive, unstable war machine (or supercharge your Automaton). Summon a Large Construct in an unoccupied space within 10 feet. Stats: 50 HP, Armor Score 4. It acts immediately. It has two attacks: Slam (2d10 Bludgeoning) and Flamethrower (3d6 Fire, 15ft Cone). It falls apart after 1 minute.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: The architect of the arcane. You do not guess; you calculate. You master the laws of magic to shape spells with perfect efficiency and devastating area effects.

synergy_feats.name: Metamagic Adept
synergy_feats.effect: You have unlocked the secrets of spell modification. When you apply one or more Spell Modifications (e.g., Empower, Widen, Reach) to a spell, the first Modification does not increase the Casting DC (it still increases MP cost).
synergy_feats.details: Allows safer casting of complex spells.

synergy_feats.name: Fireball
synergy_feats.effect: You hurl a bead of fire to a point within 60 feet. It explodes in a 20-foot radius. Make a Casting Check. All creatures in the area must compare their Reflex Save to your Result. Fail: Take 5d6 Fire Damage. Success: Take Half Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Wall of Force
synergy_feats.effect: You create an invisible, indestructible barrier within 60 feet. You can shape it into a hemispherical dome (10ft radius) or a flat surface (up to 40ft long). It blocks all physical objects, spells, and ethereal travel. It is immune to all damage. If the wall cuts through a creature's space, they are pushed to one side. Duration: 10 Minutes (Concentration).

classes.name: Void-Caller
classes.description: A scholar of the abyss. You treat the void as a formula to be solved, weaving spells that bind enemies with gravity, entropy, and forbidden geometry.

synergy_feats.name: Abyssal Tether
synergy_feats.effect: You manifest a chain of heavy gravity. Range 30ft. Make a Casting Check. The target must compare their Strength Save to your Result. Fail: They are Tethered for 1 minute. While Tethered, their Speed is Halved and they have Disadvantage on all Defense Checks.

synergy_feats.name: Void Swap
synergy_feats.effect: You fold space to exchange positions. Target one creature within 60 feet. Make a Casting Check vs their Will Save. Success: You teleport to their space, and they teleport to yours. Upon arrival, the target takes 3d10 Force Damage from spatial decompression.

synergy_feats.name: Singularity
synergy_feats.effect: You create a microscopic black hole at a point within 60 feet. 1. Pull: All Large or smaller creatures within 20 feet of the point must make a Strength Save vs your Result or be pulled to the center and Knocked Prone. 2. Crush: Creatures in the center take 5d10 Force Damage. 3. Duration: Concentration (1 Minute). The pull repeats at the start of your turns.

classes.name: Oracle
classes.description: A scholar of divine law and prophecy. You read the future in the flow of magic, revealing hidden truths and manipulating fate to favor your allies.

synergy_feats.name: Omen of Truth
synergy_feats.effect: You perceive an enemy's immediate future. Target one creature within 60 feet. Make a Casting Check vs their Will Save Value. Success: 1. You learn their current HP and Immunities. 2. The next attack made against them by an ally has Advantage and deals an additional 1d8 Radiant Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Eye of Providence
synergy_feats.effect: You open a third eye of pure light. You create a 30-foot radius aura centered on yourself for 1 minute (Concentration). 1. You and your allies in the aura gain True Sight (See Invisible/Illusions). 2. Enemies in the aura cannot benefit from Cover or Stealth.

synergy_feats.name: Rewrite Fate
synergy_feats.effect: You force a specific destiny upon the battlefield. Choose One: 1. Doom: Target one enemy. Make a Casting Check vs Will. Success: Target gains Vulnerability to ALL damage until the start of your next turn. 2. Salvation: All allies within 60 feet regain 4d8 HP and end all negative conditions.

classes.name: Elementalist
classes.description: A master of nature's raw fury. You channel the storm, the volcano, and the avalanche, blending arcane precision with primal chaos to annihilate your foes.

synergy_feats.name: Chromatic Bolt
synergy_feats.effect: You fire a concentrated beam of energy. Range 60ft. Make a Ranged Casting Check vs Defense. On a Hit: Deal 1d10 Damage. Choose the type: 1. Fire: Target gains Burning (1d4/turn). 2. Cold: Target's Speed is reduced by 10ft. 3. Lightning: Target cannot use Reactions.

synergy_feats.name: Reactive Barrier
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You take damage from an enemy within 60 feet. Effect: You conjure a shield of swirling elements. Reduce the damage taken by 1d10 + Casting Modifier. The attacker immediately takes 1d10 Elemental Damage (Fire, Cold, or Lightning).

synergy_feats.name: Cataclysm
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a disaster. Choose a point within 60 feet. A 20-foot radius storm erupts for 1 minute. 1. Initial: Creatures in the area make a Reflex Save vs your Result. Fail: 4d10 Damage + Prone. 2. Zone: Any creature ending its turn in the area takes 2d10 Elemental Damage.

classes.name: Warlock
classes.description: A gambler who plays with the forces of the abyss. You wield raw, self-destructive magic, blasting foes with force and financing your power with your own vitality.

synergy_feats.name: Eldritch Blast
synergy_feats.effect: You fire a beam of crackling energy. Range 60ft. Make a Ranged Casting Check vs Defense. On a Hit: Deal 1d10 + CHA Modifier Force Damage. Push: You can push the target 10 feet away. Special: You can cast this spell by paying 2 HP instead of 1 MP.

synergy_feats.name: Dark One's Blessing
synergy_feats.effect: You feed on the demise of your foes. Whenever you reduce a hostile creature to 0 HP or score a Critical Hit with a spell, you gain Temporary Hit Points equal to your Level + CHA Modifier.

synergy_feats.name: Hurl Through Hell
synergy_feats.effect: You banish a creature to a nightmare realm. Target one creature within 60 feet. Make a Casting Check vs their Will Save. Success: The target disappears (removed from play) until the end of your next turn. Upon returning to the space it left, it takes 6d10 Psychic Damage and is Frightened for 1 minute.

classes.name: Heretic
classes.description: A priest of forbidden truths. You view life and death as a transaction. You siphon vitality from your enemies to heal your allies, and sacrifice your own blood to fuel miracles.

synergy_feats.name: Vitality Siphon
synergy_feats.effect: You rip the life force from a foe to mend a friend. Range 60ft. Make a Ranged Casting Check vs Defense. On a Hit: Deal 1d8 Necrotic Damage. One ally within 30 feet of the target immediately regains Hit Points equal to the damage dealt.

synergy_feats.name: Crimson Offering
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An ally within 30 feet hits with an attack or spell. Effect: You sacrifice your own blood to empower them. They deal an additional 2d6 Necrotic Damage on the hit, and then they heal for that same amount (2d6).

synergy_feats.name: Rite of Equilibrium
synergy_feats.effect: You balance the scales of life and death. Choose a point within 60 feet. A 30-foot radius sphere appears. 1. Enemies in the area must make a Fortitude Save vs your Result. Fail: 4d8 Necrotic Damage. 2. Allies in the area regain 4d8 Hit Points. 3. All conditions (positive and negative) in the area are ended.

classes.name: Witch
classes.description: A vessel for the dark nature of the world. You do not ask nature for aid; you bargain with its feral, predatory spirit. You twist flesh, curse the proud, and bind enemies in thorns.

synergy_feats.name: Binding Roots
synergy_feats.effect: You command roots to strangle a foe. Range 60ft. Make a Ranged Casting Check vs Defense. On a Hit: Deal 1d8 Piercing Damage. The target is Grappled (Speed 0) by the vines. They must use an Action to escape (Athletics vs your Casting Result).

synergy_feats.name: Baleful Polymorph
synergy_feats.effect: You curse a creature to become a harmless beast. Target one creature within 30 feet. Make a Casting Check vs their Fortitude Save Value. Success: The target turns into a Toad or Newt (1 HP, AC 10, Speed 5ft, No Actions) for 1 minute. The spell ends early if the target takes any damage.

synergy_feats.name: Creeping Doom
synergy_feats.effect: You summon a massive swarm of biting insects or rot. Choose a point within 60 feet. A 20-foot radius sphere of darkness and stinging bites appears for 1 minute. 1. The area is Heavily Obscured and Difficult Terrain. 2. Enemies take 4d10 Poison Damage at the start of their turn (No Save).

classes.name: Prophet
classes.description: The purest conduit of divine power. You are not merely a servant of a god; you are a living miracle. You bring absolute healing to the faithful and blinding judgment to the wicked.

synergy_feats.name: Divine Mandate
synergy_feats.effect: You speak a word of power. Range 60ft. Choose one: 1. Heal: Target ally regains 1d8 + WIS Modifier HP. 2. Smite: Make a Ranged Casting Check vs Defense. On a Hit: Deal 1d10 Radiant Damage. If the target is Undead or Fiend, deal 2d10 instead.

synergy_feats.name: Sacred Ground
synergy_feats.effect: You consecrate the area around you. Create a 20-foot radius aura centered on yourself for 1 minute (Concentration). 1. Allies in the aura gain +2 Armor Score. 2. Enemies ending their turn in the aura take 1d6 Radiant Damage (No Save).

synergy_feats.name: Hand of God
synergy_feats.effect: You call down a pillar of absolute light. Choose a point within 60 feet. A 30-foot radius cylinder strikes. 1. Enemies take 5d10 Radiant Damage and are Blinded (Fortitude Save vs Result for half damage/no blind). 2. Allies in the area regain 5d10 HP and are cured of all negative conditions.

classes.name: Shaman
classes.description: A spiritual guide who speaks for the land and the ancestors. You summon totems to ward your allies and call down storms to punish those who disrespect the spirits.

synergy_feats.name: Storm-Lash
synergy_feats.effect: You channel lightning to strike a foe and energize a friend. Range 60ft. Make a Ranged Casting Check vs Defense. On a Hit: Deal 1d10 Lightning Damage. The energy arcs to an ally within 30 feet of the target, granting them +10 feet Speed and +1d6 Temporary HP.

synergy_feats.name: Spirit Totem
synergy_feats.effect: You summon a spectral totem in an unoccupied space within 30 feet. It projects a 20-foot radius aura for 1 minute. Choose an Aspect: 1. Turtle: Allies in aura gain +2 Armor Score. 2. Wolf: Allies in aura deal +1d4 damage on hits. 3. Owl: Allies in aura can see Invisible creatures.

synergy_feats.name: Ancestral Storm
synergy_feats.effect: You conjure a swirling tempest of spirits. Choose a point within 60 feet. A 30-foot radius cylinder strikes. 1. Enemies take 4d10 Lightning Damage (Reflex Save vs Result for half). 2. Allies in the area are healed for an amount equal to the damage dealt to the highest-damage target.

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: The raw, untamed power of nature. You do not serve the wild; you are the storm, the earthquake, and the beast. You shift forms to tear enemies apart or reshape the battlefield with grasping roots.

synergy_feats.name: Wild Shape
synergy_feats.effect: You transform into a beast of battle for 1 minute. 1. You gain 10 Temporary HP. 2. Your Unarmed Strike becomes 1d8 Damage. 3. Choose a Form: *Predator* (+10ft Speed, Advantage on Attacks if ally adjacent) or *Guardian* (+2 Armor Score, Cannot be Knocked Prone).

synergy_feats.name: Overgrowth
synergy_feats.effect: You command the earth to reclaim the battlefield. Choose a 30-foot radius area within 60 feet. 1. The area is Difficult Terrain. 2. Creatures starting their turn there must make a Reflex Save vs your Casting Check. Fail: They are Restrained by vines (Strength DC 14 to break).

synergy_feats.name: Force of Nature
synergy_feats.effect: You become an Avatar of the Wild (Giant Treant, Elemental, or Dinosaur) for 1 minute. 1. Size becomes Huge (15ft Reach). 2. You gain Resistance to ALL Damage. 3. Your Melee Attacks deal 3d10 Damage and deal Double Damage to objects and structures.

classes.name: Spellblade
classes.description: The master of the arcane arts of war. You weave magic into your sword swings, using tactical precision to deliver elemental destruction at point-blank range.

synergy_feats.name: Arcane Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You imbue your weapon with raw magic. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal normal Weapon Damage plus an additional 1d6 Force Damage. Additionally, you may push the target 10 feet away from you (Force impulse).

synergy_feats.name: Spell-Weave
synergy_feats.effect: You cast a spell through your blade. Choose an Arcanist spell you know (e.g., Firebolt, Burning Hands). Make a Melee Weapon Attack. On a Hit: Deal normal Weapon Damage, and the Spell successfully hits the target automatically (or they have Disadvantage on the Save). Does not provoke Opportunity Attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Force Blade Execution
synergy_feats.effect: You manifest a blade of pure energy. Make a Melee Attack. This attack is treated as an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). It deals Critical Weapon Damage plus 4d10 Force Damage (Ignoring Armor). If this kills the target, you regain 1d4 Mana Points.

classes.name: Hexblade
classes.description: A warrior bound by a dark pact to a sentient weapon or shadow entity. You fuel your strikes with your own blood, cursing foes and draining their life to sustain your own.

synergy_feats.name: Crimson Rite
synergy_feats.effect: You coat your weapon in cursed power (or your own blood). Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d10 Necrotic Damage. Special: You may pay 2 HP instead of the 1 MP cost for this ability.

synergy_feats.name: Siphon Vitality
synergy_feats.effect: You impale a foe to drain their essence. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Necrotic Damage. You immediately Heal Hit Points equal to the Necrotic damage dealt. Additionally, the target is Weakened (dealing half damage) until the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Doombringer
synergy_feats.effect: You gamble your soul on a single strike. Make a Melee Attack against an enemy. On a Hit: This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). Deal Critical Weapon Damage plus 6d10 Necrotic Damage. On a Miss: You take 2d10 Necrotic Damage (Ignores Armor) as the pact backfires.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: A holy warrior and battlefield leader. You do not hide in temples; you bring your faith to the front lines, protecting allies with a shield of devotion and smiting the wicked with righteous fire.

synergy_feats.name: Divine Smite
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee attack. Effect: The attack deals an additional 1d8 Radiant Damage. If the target is an Undead or Fiend, the bonus increases to 2d8 Radiant Damage, and this damage ignores the target's Armor Score.

synergy_feats.name: Champion's Mercy
synergy_feats.effect: You charge through the fray to save a life. Move up to your Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks, ending adjacent to an ally. Touch that ally to restore 3d6 + WIS Mod HP. If the ally was at 0 HP, they can immediately use their Reaction to stand up or make an attack.

synergy_feats.name: Exalted Judgment
synergy_feats.effect: You strike with the weight of a god. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 4d8 Radiant Damage. Burst: You and all allies within 30 feet regain Hit Points equal to the Radiant Damage dealt by this attack.

classes.name: Storm Vanguard
classes.description: A warrior who commands the shock and awe of the storm. You wear plate armor that conducts electricity, using wind to reposition allies and thunder to shatter enemy lines.

synergy_feats.name: Thunderous Rebuke
synergy_feats.effect: You strike with the weight of a storm front. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Thunder Damage. The target is pushed 10 feet away from you. If they hit a wall or another creature, they are knocked Prone.

synergy_feats.name: Cloak of the Zephyr
synergy_feats.effect: You wrap a creature in protective winds. Touch yourself or an ally. For 1 minute, Ranged Attacks against them have Disadvantage, and their Speed increases by 10 feet. When you cast this, the target can immediately use their Reaction to move up to their new Speed without provoking counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Ride the Lightning
synergy_feats.effect: You transform into a bolt of electricity. Teleport to an unoccupied space adjacent to an enemy within 60 feet. Arrival: All creatures within 10 feet of your destination (except you) take 2d8 Thunder Damage. Strike: Immediately make a Melee Attack against the target. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage + 4d8 Lightning Damage.

classes.name: Spell-Smasher
classes.description: A brute who channels magic through pure physical stress. You carve unstable runes into your weapons and release them on impact, shattering magical defenses and exploding enemies.

synergy_feats.name: Rune-Crush
synergy_feats.effect: You detonate a rune on impact. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Force Damage. Regardless of whether you hit or miss the primary target, the rune releases a shockwave: all *other* creatures adjacent to the target take 1d4 Force Damage automatically.

synergy_feats.name: Spell-Breaker
synergy_feats.effect: You strike to disrupt magic. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Force Damage. Any active magical buffs on the target (e.g., Shield, Haste) end immediately. If your Attack Roll exceeds the target's Will Save Value, they are also Silenced until the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Arcane Annihilation
synergy_feats.effect: You overload your body with mana and leap into the fray. Jump up to 30 feet to a point you can see (No OA). Upon landing, you slam the ground. All creatures within 15 feet (except you) must make a Reflex Save against your Athletics Check. Fail: Take 4d10 Force Damage, knocked Prone, and Dazed. Pass: Half damage.

classes.name: Bloodrager
classes.description: A warrior whose fury is fueled by a dark entity or curse. You let the monster inside take the wheel, shedding your own blood to deal necrotic damage and terrifying your foes.

synergy_feats.name: Sanguine Cleave
synergy_feats.effect: You coat your weapon in cursed blood. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d8 Necrotic Damage. Optional: You may choose to take 1d6 Damage (cannot be reduced) to increase the bonus Necrotic Damage to 2d8.

synergy_feats.name: Blood-Boil Nova
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a psychic scream. Make an Intimidation Check. All enemies within 20 feet must compare their Will Save Value to your result. Fail: They take 3d6 Psychic Damage and are Frightened for 1 round. If this kills a creature, you immediately regain 1 Stamina.

synergy_feats.name: Avatar of Slaughter
synergy_feats.effect: You assume a demonic form for 1 minute. 1. Size: You grow Large (Reach +5ft). 2. Life Drinker: Regain 1d12 HP once per turn when you hit a creature. 3. Unstoppable: Immune to Charmed, Frightened, and Stunned. Warning: When this effect ends, you gain one level of Exhaustion.

classes.name: Inquisitor
classes.description: A furious holy warrior who hunts heretics and monsters. You channel divine wrath through heavy weapons, crushing bodies and silencing wicked tongues with decisive force.

synergy_feats.name: Hammer of Heresy
synergy_feats.effect: You strike to bind the wicked. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d8 Radiant Damage. If your Attack Roll exceeds the target's Reflex Save Value, they are Knocked Prone and their Speed is reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Silence the Unbeliever
synergy_feats.effect: You deliver a blow to shatter concentration. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d8 Thunder Damage. The target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: They are Stunned for 1 round and Silenced (cannot cast spells) for 1 minute.

synergy_feats.name: Rite of Annihilation
synergy_feats.effect: You erase an enemy from existence. Make a Melee Attack. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). It deals Critical Weapon Damage plus 4d8 Radiant Damage (Ignoring Armor). If this reduces the target to 0 HP, their body turns to ash, and you regain 1d10 HP and 1 Stamina.

classes.name: Shapeshifter
classes.description: A warrior who treats their body as a weapon to be forged in combat. You use visceral magic to grow claws, bone plates, and titanic muscle, becoming a monster to fight monsters.

synergy_feats.name: Mutating Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You force a violent evolution upon a limb. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal 1d10 Damage + STR Mod. For the next 1 minute, your Unarmed Strike becomes a Heavy Weapon dealing 1d8 Damage. You also gain 1d6 Temporary Hit Points.

synergy_feats.name: Adaptive Flesh
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You take damage. Effect: Your body instantly evolves to counter the threat. Reduce the damage by 1d12 + CON Modifier. Additionally, you gain Resistance to that specific Damage Type (e.g., Fire, Slashing) for 1 minute.

synergy_feats.name: Titanic Growth
synergy_feats.effect: You grow to Huge size for 1 minute. 1. Your Reach increases by 10 feet. 2. Your melee attacks deal an additional +1d12 Damage. 3. Trample: You can move through spaces occupied by smaller creatures. They must make a Reflex Save vs your Athletics Check or take 2d8 Bludgeoning Damage and be Flattened (Prone).

classes.name: Glyph-Warden
classes.description: A sentinel who inscribes magic onto steel. You are a battery of defensive power, turning your shield into a trap and your armor into a repulsion field.

synergy_feats.name: Glyph of Retribution
