synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You use the Block Action. Effect: You gain Advantage on the Block Check. Regardless of success, the attacker takes 1d6 Force Damage. If the Block was successful (you took no damage), the attacker is also pushed 10 feet away.

synergy_feats.name: Circle of Warding
synergy_feats.effect: You inscribe a 15-foot-radius circle on the ground (1 min). 1. Allies inside gain +1 Armor Score. 2. The area is Difficult Terrain for enemies. 3. Enemies ending their turn inside take 1d4 Force Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Living Monolith
synergy_feats.effect: You become an avatar of force for 1 minute. 1. You gain Resistance to ALL Damage. 2. You are Immune to Prone/Forced Movement. 3. Reflective Carapace: When a creature hits you with a melee attack, they take 1d8 Force Damage (Ignores Armor).

classes.name: Grave Warden
classes.description: A protector of the threshold between life and death. You use necrotic magic to drain the strength of your foes, binding their souls to yours and punishing them for every blow they strike.

synergy_feats.name: Vampiric Block
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You use the Block Action. Effect: You gain Advantage on the Block Check. If the Block is successful (you take no damage), the attacker takes 1d6 Necrotic Damage, and you immediately Regain HP equal to the damage dealt.

synergy_feats.name: Tether of the Damned
synergy_feats.effect: Target one enemy within 30 feet. Make a Check (CON/CHA) vs their Will Save. Success: Target is Tethered (1 min). 1. They have Disadvantage on attacks not targeting you. 2. Sympathetic Pain: Whenever YOU take damage, the Tethered target takes 1d6 Necrotic Damage (Ignores Armor).

synergy_feats.name: Aura of the Crypt
synergy_feats.effect: You emit a 15-foot entropy aura (1 min). 1. Area is Difficult Terrain. 2. Enemies starting turn in aura take 2d6 Necrotic (You heal 1 HP per enemy damaged). 3. Undying: You are Immune to Unconscious. You remain standing and acting at 0 HP, though you must still make Death Saves.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: A protector who brings the temple to the trenches. You carry the heaviest shields and channel the strongest prayers, refusing to let your allies fall as long as you draw breath.

synergy_feats.name: Blessed Block
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You use the Block Action. Effect: You gain Advantage on the Block Check. Regardless of the block's outcome, holy light erupts from your shield. Choose yourself or an ally within 10 feet to immediately regain 1d8 Hit Points. If you roll a Natural 20 on the Block check, the healing is Maximized (8 HP).

synergy_feats.name: Sanctified Ground
synergy_feats.effect: You consecrate the earth beneath you. You create a 15-foot-radius aura centered on yourself for 1 minute. 1. Holy Ward: You and all allies in the circle gain +2 Armor Score. 2. Renewal: Allies starting their turn in the circle regain 1d4 Hit Points. 3. Rebuke: Any Undead or Fiend entering the circle takes 1d6 Radiant Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Martyr's Intercession
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An ally within 30 feet is reduced to 0 HP or killed. Effect: You instantly Teleport adjacent to them. The ally is restored to Half their Maximum HP and cured of all negative conditions. Cost: You take damage equal to the amount of HP restored. This damage cannot be reduced or prevented.

classes.name: Earth-Warden
classes.description: A sentinel sworn to the mountain itself. You are the immovable object made manifest, using roots to bind foes and raising walls of stone to shield the weak.

synergy_feats.name: Entangling Block
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You use the Block Action. Effect: You gain Advantage on the Block Check. Regardless of the outcome, vines and stone erupt from your shield to catch the attacker. They must make a Reflex Save against your Block Check Result. On a failure, they are Grappled (Speed 0) until they use an Action to escape.

synergy_feats.name: Tectonic Rampart
synergy_feats.effect: You slam the earth. Choose One: 1. Wall: Create a physical wall of stone (20ft long, 5ft high) adjacent to you. It provides Cover. 2. Eruption: Create the wall under an enemy's feet. They must make a Reflex Save vs. your Guardian Check or take 2d6 Bludgeoning Damage and be knocked Prone.

synergy_feats.name: Avatar of the Mountain
synergy_feats.effect: You transform into a colossus of stone for 1 minute. 1. Size: You become Large (Reach +5ft). 2. Skin: You gain Resistance to Non-Magical Physical Damage. 3. Aura: The ground within 15 feet of you is Difficult Terrain. 4. Siege: Your melee attacks deal an additional +1d10 Damage (+Double vs Structures).

classes.name: Arcane Archer
classes.description: A master of ballistics and bombardment. You do not see a bow as a simple weapon, but as a delivery system for destruction, firing arrows that burn, freeze, or tear holes in reality.

synergy_feats.name: Elemental Shot
synergy_feats.effect: You infuse your ammunition with energy. Make a Ranged Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal normal Weapon Damage plus a secondary effect: 1. Fire: +1d6 Fire Damage and the target Burns. 2. Ice: +1d6 Cold Damage and target Speed is Halved. 3. Force: The arrow seeks the target, ignoring Cover, and deals +1d6 Force Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Phase Arrow
synergy_feats.effect: You fire a projectile that exists between dimensions. Make a Ranged Attack that Ignores Cover and Armor Score. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Force Damage. Immediately after the shot, you can Teleport to an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the target.

synergy_feats.name: Singularity Volley
synergy_feats.effect: You fire an arrow that collapses reality. Make a Ranged Attack. Whether you hit or miss, a 15-foot-radius gravity well erupts at the target point. 1. Pull: All creatures in the radius must make a Reflex Save vs your Attack Roll or be pulled 10ft to the center and knocked Prone. 2. Crush: All creatures in the radius take 4d10 Force Damage. 3. Impact: If you hit a creature directly, they also take Weapon Damage.

classes.name: Nightblade
classes.description: A killer who weaves shadows into a weapon. You do not merely hide in the dark; you travel through it. You teleport across the battlefield to strike exposed vitals with a blade wreathed in curses.

synergy_feats.name: Shadow-Step Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You slip through a crack in reality. 1. Teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space adjacent to an enemy. 2. Immediately make a Melee Attack against that enemy with Advantage. 3. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Necrotic Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Cloak of Nightmares
synergy_feats.effect: You strike with a blade of maddening whispers. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Psychic Damage, and the target is Blinded until the start of your next turn. Effect: Regardless of whether you hit or miss, you become Invisible until you attack or take damage.

synergy_feats.name: Void Walker's Execution
synergy_feats.effect: You become a living shadow. 1. Move up to your Full Speed. You are Incorporeal during this move (can pass through walls/creatures). 2. At the end of the move, make one Melee Attack with Advantage. 3. On a Hit: Treat the roll as a Natural 20 (Critical). Deal Critical Weapon Damage plus 4d10 Necrotic Damage (Ignoring Armor).

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: A divine agent of physical perfection. You channel your god's power through your fists, striking with a flurry of blows that disrupt life force and shatter bone.

synergy_feats.name: Radiant Flurry
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a barrage of holy strikes. Make Two separate Unarmed Attacks. Each deals Weapon Damage plus 1d4 Radiant Damage. If at least one attack hits, you immediately regain 1d6 Hit Points as the kinetic energy cycles back into your spirit.

synergy_feats.name: Resonant Palm
synergy_feats.effect: You strike a nerve cluster with divine will. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Thunder Damage. The target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: They are Stunned for 1 round. Effect: You can Disengage as a Free Action.

synergy_feats.name: Transcendence
synergy_feats.effect: You become a beam of pure light. 1. Move up to Double Speed (No OA, pass through enemies). 2. Make one Melee Attack against EVERY enemy you pass (Max 5). Each hit deals 1d10 Radiant Damage. 3. Purge: At the end of the move, you are cured of all negative conditions and regain 10 HP.

classes.name: Spirit-Walker
classes.description: A warrior who treads the line between the material world and the spirit realm. You phase through walls, run on air, and deliver strikes that bypass steel to cut directly at the soul.

synergy_feats.name: Wind-Step Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You wrap yourself in a sheath of spiraling wind. You can Move up to your Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks. At the end of the move, make a single Melee Attack Check with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Thunder Damage, and the target is pushed 5 feet away from you.

synergy_feats.name: Ethereal Jaunt
synergy_feats.effect: You become a ghost of the battlefield. 1. You become Incorporeal until the end of your turn (passing through objects/creatures; take 1d10 damage if you end inside one). 2. Move up to your Full Speed. 3. Make a single Melee Attack that Ignores Armor Score. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Force Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Avatar of the Storm
synergy_feats.effect: You surrender your form to become a living tempest for 1 minute. 1. You gain a Fly Speed equal to your walking speed. 2. You have Advantage on all Dodge Defense Checks. 3. Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a melee attack, you deal an additional +1d10 Lightning Damage.

classes.name: Ninja
classes.description: A disciplined operative of the shadows. You do not fight fair; you fight to win. You blend martial arts with dirty tricks, striking from the dark to silence enemies before they can scream.

synergy_feats.name: Silent Takedown
synergy_feats.effect: You execute a flawless assassination technique. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage + 2d6 Precision Damage. The target is Silenced (cannot speak/cast) until the start of your next turn. If you were Hidden, you remain Hidden after the attack.

synergy_feats.name: Shadow Substitution
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You are hit by an attack. Effect: You take 0 Damage as you replace yourself with a log or decoy. You immediately Teleport 15 feet to an unoccupied space and gain the Hidden condition.

synergy_feats.name: Blade of the Void
synergy_feats.effect: You channel your ki into a single, perfect strike. Make a Melee Attack. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). It deals Critical Weapon Damage + 4d8 Precision Damage (Ignoring Armor and Resistance). If the target survives, they are Stunned for 1 round.

classes.name: Monster Hunter
classes.description: A professional slayer of beasts and titans. You prepare the battlefield with traps, track your quarry with supernatural precision, and strike the weak points of creatures ten times your size.

synergy_feats.name: Hobbling Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You strike a vital tendon to ground your prey. Make a Weapon Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Precision Damage. If your Attack Roll exceeds the target's Fortitude Save Value, their Speed is reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Flash-Trap
synergy_feats.effect: You deploy a trap directly onto a foe during a strike. Consume 1 Trap Reagent (e.g., Snare, Caltrops). Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d8. The target suffers the Reagent's full effect immediately. They have Disadvantage on any Save to resist the trap.

synergy_feats.name: Leviathan Bane
synergy_feats.effect: You strike the fatal flaw in a titan. Make a Melee or Ranged Attack. If the target is Large size or larger, this is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). Deal Critical Weapon Damage plus 4d10 Precision Damage. If the target survives, it is Weakened and Bleeding for 1 minute.

classes.name: Captain
classes.description: An officer who leads from the front. You demand discipline and courage, coordinating your squad's attacks and turning them into an unbreakable wall.

synergy_feats.name: Direct the Assault
synergy_feats.effect: You create an opening for a teammate. Make a Weapon Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Normal Damage. Additionally, one ally who can see you can immediately use their Reaction to make a single Weapon Attack against the same target with Advantage.

synergy_feats.name: Hold the Line
synergy_feats.effect: You bellow a command to steel your squad. Create a 30-foot aura centered on yourself for 1 minute. 1. Allies in the aura are Immune to Frightened. 2. Allies in the aura gain +1 Armor Score. 3. Upon activation, all allies gain 1d8 Temporary Hit Points.

synergy_feats.name: Total War
synergy_feats.effect: You direct a synchronized offensive. Choose a number of allies equal to your INT or CHA Modifier (min 2). Each chosen ally immediately takes ONE COMPLETE ACTION (Attack, Cast Spell, Dash, etc.) as a Free Action. This does not cost their Reaction.

classes.name: Siege Master
classes.description: A warrior-scholar of destruction. You apply alchemy and engineering to the front line, breaching gates, fortifying positions, and turning corridors into kill-zones.

synergy_feats.name: Breaching Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You detonate a charge on impact. Consume 1 Damaging Reagent (e.g., Bomb, Acid). Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus the Reagent's Damage. The target's Armor Score is permanently reduced by 1 (Sunder). Against Objects/Structures, this deals Double Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Deploy Barricade
synergy_feats.effect: You instantly assemble a defensive line. Create a 15-foot long line of Cover adjacent to you. 1. Allies behind it gain +2 Armor Score against Ranged Attacks. 2. Enemies crossing the line treat it as Difficult Terrain and take 2d6 Piercing Damage (Spikes).

synergy_feats.name: Bunker Buster
synergy_feats.effect: You launch a payload designed to level fortifications. Consume 1 Explosive Reagent. Choose a point within 60 feet. 1. All non-magical walls, cover, and objects in a 20-foot radius are destroyed. 2. Creatures in the area take 5d10 Bludgeoning Damage. 3. Creatures must make a Fortitude Save vs your Athletics Check or be Stunned for 1 round.

classes.name: Thug
classes.description: A brutal enforcer who fights dirty. You don't care about honor; you care about winning. You blind, cripple, and mug your opponents, exploiting every moment of weakness.

synergy_feats.name: Dirty Haymaker
synergy_feats.effect: You feint a heavy attack to deliver a cheap shot. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Precision Damage. Additionally, the target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: Choose one: 1. Gouge: Target is Blinded for 1 round. 2. Kneecap: Target is Knocked Prone.

synergy_feats.name: Violent Shakedown
synergy_feats.effect: You slam an enemy to rattle their gear. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Precision Damage. 1. The target is forced to drop one held item (Weapon/Shield/Item). 2. The target is Dazed (can only take Action or Move) until the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Kingpin's Cruelty
synergy_feats.effect: Requirement: Target must have a negative condition (e.g., Prone, Blinded, Grappled). Make a Melee Attack. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). Deal Critical Weapon Damage plus 4d10 Precision Damage. If this reduces the target to 0 HP, all other enemies within 30ft must Save vs Intimidation or be Frightened.

classes.name: Pit Fighter
classes.description: A warrior forged in the mud and blood of the arena. You fight like a cornered beast, using vicious strikes and traps to maim your prey and ensure they cannot escape.

synergy_feats.name: Maiming Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You strike to hobble. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Precision Damage. The target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: Target is Bleeding and Speed is Halved (1 min). If you are Grappling the target, they Auto-Fail the save.

synergy_feats.name: Iron-Jaw Slam
synergy_feats.effect: Consume 1 Trap Reagent (e.g., Snare, Caltrops). Make a Melee Attack (Slam). On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d8. You slam the target into the trap, forcing them to suffer its full effects immediately. They have Disadvantage on any save to resist the trap.

synergy_feats.name: The Killing Floor
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a primal roar. Make an Intimidation Check. All enemies within 30ft compare Will Save vs your result. Fail: Frightened (1 min) and cannot Dash/Disengage. Then, make one Melee Attack against an adjacent foe. If they are Frightened, it is an Automatic Critical Hit.

classes.name: Warlord
classes.description: A ruler of the battlefield who demands victory at any cost. You use terrifying aggression to break enemy morale and drive your allies into a blood-fueled frenzy.

synergy_feats.name: Savage Directive
synergy_feats.effect: You deliver a crushing blow to mark a target. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Normal Weapon Damage. The target is Marked until the start of your next turn. The first time an ally hits this Marked target, they deal an additional +1d8 Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Aura of Dominance
synergy_feats.effect: You project an aura of terrifying authority. Make an Intimidation Check. All enemies within 30 feet must compare their Will Save Value to your result. Fail: They are Frightened of you for 1 minute. Passive: Allies within 30 feet have Advantage on Attacks against Frightened creatures.

synergy_feats.name: War Cry of the Titan
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a primal scream. 1. Enemies within 60 feet must make a Will Save vs. your Intimidation Check. Fail: Stunned for 1 round. 2. Allies within 60 feet enter a Frenzy for 1 minute: They gain Resistance to Physical Damage and deal +1d6 Damage on melee attacks.

classes.name: Demolitionist
classes.description: A warrior who loves the sound of shattering stone. You tape explosives to hammers, blow open doors, and solve problems by applying maximum force to the weakest point.

synergy_feats.name: Explosive Sledge
synergy_feats.effect: You detonate a charge on impact. Consume 1 Damaging Reagent (e.g., Bomb, Acid). Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus the Reagent's Damage. Shockwave: All creatures adjacent to the target (except you) must make a Reflex Save vs your Attack Roll or be Knocked Prone.

synergy_feats.name: Ground Zero
synergy_feats.effect: You trigger an explosion centered on yourself. Consume 1 Explosive Reagent. 1. You take Half the Reagent's Damage. 2. All enemies in the Reagent's Radius take Double the Reagent's Damage and are pushed 10 feet away. (Reflex Save vs your Fortitude/Craft Check for half).

synergy_feats.name: The Wrecking Ball
synergy_feats.effect: You charge with unstoppable momentum. Move up to your full Speed. You can move through (and destroy) non-magical walls and objects. At the end of the move, make one Melee Attack. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). Deal Critical Weapon Damage plus 4d10 Bludgeoning Damage. Structures take Triple Damage. The target is Stunned.

classes.name: Shadow-Guard
classes.description: A deceptive defender who protects by baiting attacks. You lure enemies into overextending, blocking their strikes with hidden shields and answering with a blade in the ribs.

synergy_feats.name: Deceptive Block
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You use the Block Action against a melee attack. Effect: You gain Advantage on the Block Check. If the Block is successful (you take no damage), the attacker is caught off guard. You immediately deal 1d6 Precision Damage to them, and they are Blinded until the start of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Shadow Interception
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An ally within 15 feet is targeted by an attack. Effect: You instantly move to an unoccupied space adjacent to that ally (No OA). The attack targets you instead. You make your Defense Check with Advantage. If the attack misses, both you and the ally gain Advantage on your next Attack against that enemy.

synergy_feats.name: Assassin's Aegis
synergy_feats.effect: You enter a stance of perfect, lethal stillness for 1 round. 1. You gain a +5 Bonus to ALL Defense Checks. 2. Reaction: If a creature misses you with a melee attack (or you Block it), you can make a single Melee Attack against them. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20) dealing Crit Damage + 4d6 Precision Damage.

classes.name: Beast-Guard
classes.description: A sentinel of the wild. You bond with a massive beasta bear, tortoise, or boarfighting as a single defensive unit to shield the pack and crush intruders.

synergy_feats.name: Bond of the Ward-Beast
synergy_feats.effect: Passive: You gain a Ward-Beast (HP: Level x 5, Armor Score: 2, Dmg: 1d6). Reaction (2 STA): When an ally within 15 feet is hit by an attack, your Beast immediately moves adjacent to them and takes the damage instead.

synergy_feats.name: Phalanx of Tooth and Claw
synergy_feats.effect: You and your beast lock into a defensive formation for 1 minute. 1. Shared Defense: Both you and the beast gain +2 Armor Score. 2. Sanctuary: Any ally adjacent to either you or the beast cannot be Flanked and has Advantage on Defense Checks.

synergy_feats.name: Spirit of the Ancient Guardian
synergy_feats.effect: You merge life forces for 1 minute. 1. Shared Health: You and the beast share a single HP pool (Damage to either subtracts from this total). 2. Regen: At the start of your turn, the pool regains 1d10 HP. 3. Vengeance: If an enemy damages the beast, your next attack against them deals +2d8 Damage.

classes.name: Sentinel
classes.description: A paragon of defense who leads by example. You stand at the front, shouting warnings and orders that turn your party into an unbreakable fortress.

synergy_feats.name: Watcher's Warning
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An ally within 30 feet is targeted by an attack. Effect: You shout a command. The ally gains Advantage on their Defense Check against this attack. If they succeed (dodge/block), they can immediately use their Reaction to move 10 feet without provoking counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Fortress of Will
synergy_feats.effect: You create a 15-foot aura of resolve for 1 minute. 1. Iron Mind: Allies in the aura are Immune to Frightened and Charmed. 2. Stability: Allies cannot be Knocked Prone or moved against their will. 3. Shielding: Allies gain +1 Armor Score while in the aura.

synergy_feats.name: Indomitable Formation
synergy_feats.effect: You link the fates of your squad for 1 minute. Choose allies (qty = CHA Mod). 1. Damage Share: When a linked ally takes damage, you can redistribute that damage among any linked members (including yourself) to prevent anyone from dropping. 2. Retaliation: If a linked ally is hit, any *other* linked ally can use their Reaction to make an Attack against the attacker.

classes.name: Armorer
classes.description: A warrior-engineer who believes steel is the only god worth praying to. You use alchemy and mechanics to reinforce armor, creating a walking tank that punishes anyone who strikes it.

synergy_feats.name: Ablative Reinforcement
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You or an adjacent ally take physical damage. Cost: Consume 1 Reagent (Scrap/Any). Effect: You deploy a temporary plate to absorb the blow. Reduce the damage by 1d10 + INT Modifier. If the damage is reduced to 0, the attacker's weapon jars against the plating, and they are Dazed until their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Volatile Shielding
synergy_feats.effect: You coat armor or a shield in reactive paste. Consume 1 Damaging Reagent (e.g., Acid, Alchemist's Fire). For 1 minute, whenever a creature hits the wearer with a melee attack (or the wearer Blocks), the attacker takes 1d6 + INT Modifier damage of the Reagent's type.

synergy_feats.name: Living Fortress
synergy_feats.effect: You activate lockdown pistons. Enter Fortress Mode (1 min). 1. Your Speed becomes 0 (Immovable). 2. You gain Resistance to ALL Damage (Half Damage). 3. You provide Total Cover to adjacent allies. 4. Your Melee Reach increases by 5 feet.

classes.name: Assassin
classes.description: A ghost who sells death. You rely on mobility to get behind enemy lines and ruthless precision to end the fight before the enemy knows it has begun.

synergy_feats.name: Stalking Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You move unseen to deliver a killing blow. Move up to your Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks. At the end of the move, make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage + 1d8 Precision Damage. If you were Hidden or the target is Surprised, increase this bonus to 2d8.

synergy_feats.name: Vanishing Act
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You take damage from an attack. Effect: You disperse into shadows. 1. Reduce the damage taken by Half. 2. You immediately Teleport up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space. 3. You become Invisible until the start of your next turn or until you attack.

synergy_feats.name: Death's Shadow
synergy_feats.effect: You become the inevitable end. Teleport up to 60 feet to a space adjacent to an enemy. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage + 5d8 Precision Damage. This attack Ignores Armor Score. If the target is Surprised or Stunned, this attack is an Automatic Critical Hit.

classes.name: Trapper
classes.description: A hunter who treats the battlefield like a chessboard. You lead enemies on a chase that ends in a snap of steel, using movement to deploy hazards and punishing those who get caught.

synergy_feats.name: Vaulting Deployment
synergy_feats.effect: You dash across the field to place a hazard. Consume 1 Trap Reagent (e.g., Snare, Caltrops, Grease). Move up to your Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks. At any point during the move, you deploy the trap. If placed in an occupied space, the target triggers it immediately with Disadvantage on the Save. If unoccupied, it arms instantly.

synergy_feats.name: Cull the Snared
synergy_feats.effect: You strike prey that cannot flee. Target an enemy suffering from impaired movement (Grappled, Restrained, Prone, Slowed) or standing in Difficult Terrain. Make an Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d8 Precision Damage. The target's Speed is reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: The Killing Field
synergy_feats.effect: You turn the ground into a nightmare. Consume 1 Trap Reagent. Move up to Double Speed (ignoring difficult terrain/enemies). Every space you exit becomes filled with a copy of that Trap (lasting 1 minute). At the end of the move, make one Ranged Attack against a target in the field. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20).

classes.name: Scout
classes.description: The vanguard of the party. You move faster than the main force to identify threats, directing the flow of battle and creating openings for your allies to exploit.

synergy_feats.name: Vanguard's Mark
synergy_feats.effect: You dash forward to expose a target. Move up to your Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks. At the end of the move, make a Melee or Ranged Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Normal Damage. The next ally to attack this target has Advantage and deals an additional +1d6 Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Signal the Advance
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An enemy ends their turn. Effect: You signal a tactical shift. Choose a number of allies equal to your CHA Modifier. They can immediately use their Reaction to Move up to their Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: The Kill Box
synergy_feats.effect: You pin the enemy down for execution. 1. Move up to Full Speed (No OA). 2. Make one Attack against a target. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). 3. Command: Until the start of your next turn, all allies have Advantage on attacks against that target, and their hits deal an additional +1d8 Precision Damage.

classes.name: Trickster
classes.description: A warrior who treats combat as a lethal joke. You are never where the enemy looks, dashing through the melee to plant explosives and toxins before vanishing in a puff of smoke.

synergy_feats.name: Parting Gift
synergy_feats.effect: You strike and leave a nasty surprise. Consume 1 Damaging or Debuff Reagent. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus the Reagent's full Effect. After the attack, you may immediately Disengage and move 10 feet.

synergy_feats.name: Smoke-Step
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You are targeted by an attack. Consume 1 Obscuring Reagent (e.g., Smoke Bomb, Flashbomb). Effect: The attack has Disadvantage. You instantly Teleport 15 feet to an unoccupied space. The space you left is filled with the Reagent's cloud effect.

synergy_feats.name: Pandemonium
synergy_feats.effect: You move with impossible speed. Consume 1 Reagent. Move up to Double Speed (ignoring counter-attacks and passing through enemies). You may make an Attack against up to 3 separate targets you pass. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage + Maximized Reagent Effect.

classes.name: Arcane Trickster
classes.description: The ultimate magical thief. You use illusions to distract, mage hands to pilfer, and silent spells to assassinate. You don't fight fair; you fight with every magical and mundane advantage you can steal.

synergy_feats.name: Arcane Ambush
synergy_feats.effect: You weave a sneak attack into a spell. Cast an Arcanist Spell that requires an Attack Roll. You gain Advantage on the Casting Check. This casting is Subtle (no sound/gestures). If the target is Flanked, Surprised, or you are Hidden, the spell deals an additional +1d6 Precision Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Spell Thief
synergy_feats.effect: You attempt to steal a magical effect. Target a creature within 30 feet that has a magical buff (e.g., Shield, Haste, Invisibility). Make a Stealth & Thievery Check against their Will Save Value. Success: The effect ends on them and is transferred to you for 1 minute (or its remaining duration).

synergy_feats.name: Phantom Legion
synergy_feats.effect: You create 3 Illusory Duplicates in your space for 1 minute. 1. Defense: When you are targeted by an attack, roll a d6. On a 1-4, a clone takes the hit and is destroyed (you take 0 damage). 2. Offense: Whenever you hit with an Attack or Spell, add +1d8 Force Damage for every clone remaining.

classes.name: Scholar
classes.description: An adventurer who wields knowledge as a weapon. You blend arcane theory with survival skills to analyze enemies, bypass their defenses, and create perfect tactical kill-zones.

synergy_feats.name: Applied Anatomy
synergy_feats.effect: You analyze a foe to find a fatal flaw. Target one creature within 60 feet. Make a Lore or Scrutiny Check vs their Will Save Value. Success: 1. You learn their current HP, Resistances, and Immunities. 2. The target gains Vulnerability (Double Damage) to the very next source of damage it takes.

synergy_feats.name: Geometric Warding
synergy_feats.effect: You define a 20-foot square zone of protection and hazard for 1 minute. 1. Sanctuary: Allies inside have Half Cover (+2 Defense). 2. Trap: The area is Difficult Terrain for enemies. 3. Hazard: Enemies entering or starting their turn in the zone take 2d6 Force Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Universal Theory
synergy_feats.effect: You cancel the variables of an enemy's existence. Target one creature within 60 feet. Make a Casting Check against their Will Save. Success: Deal 10d6 Force Damage. This damage Ignores Armor Score, Resistance, Immunity, and Spells (like Shield). The target is also Stunned for 1 round.

classes.name: Sage
classes.description: A magical advisor and master tactician. You do not hoard knowledge; you apply it. You use magic to elevate your allies, swapping their positions, infusing their weapons, and granting them flight.

synergy_feats.name: Arcane Mandate
synergy_feats.effect: You weave a spell of acceleration. Choose one ally within 30 feet. That ally can immediately use their Reaction to make a single Weapon Attack. This attack is made with Advantage and deals an additional +1d6 Force Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Tactical Transposition
synergy_feats.effect: You rearrange the battlefield. Choose two creatures within 60 feet (one must be you or an ally). Willing targets fail automatically; unwilling enemies must make a Will Save vs. your Casting Check. If successful, the targets instantly swap positions via teleportation. An enemy swapped this way is Dazed until their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Circle of Ascension
synergy_feats.effect: You act as a conduit for raw power. You create a 30-foot radius aura centered on yourself for 1 minute (Concentration). You and all allies in the aura gain: 1. A Fly Speed of 30 feet (Hover). 2. Resistance to damage from Spells. 3. An additional +1d8 Force Damage on all weapon attacks.

classes.name: Artificer
classes.description: A magical engineer who binds arcane forces into clockwork and steel. You solve problems by building the solution, infusing volatile reagents with mana to create seeking projectiles and automated spells.

synergy_feats.name: Arcane Infusion
synergy_feats.effect: You transmute a physical reagent into a bolt of magical force. Consume 1 Damaging Reagent (e.g., Acid, Bomb). Make a Ranged Casting Check. 1. The attack Ignores Cover. 2. The damage type becomes Force Damage. 3. The damage is increased by +1d8.

synergy_feats.name: Spell-Storing Trigger
synergy_feats.effect: You cast an Arcanist spell (Cost 1 MP) into a weapon or object. It remains stored for 1 hour. Trigger: The next time the weapon hits or the object is used, the spell activates immediately on the target (Auto-Hit). You do not need to pay the spell's MP cost at the time of triggering.

synergy_feats.name: The Automaton Engine
synergy_feats.effect: You integrate with a masterwork construct suit for 1 minute. 1. You gain 20 Temporary HP. 2. You gain Resistance to Spell Damage and Immunity to Charmed/Frightened. 3. Automated Systems: Once per turn, you can use a Reagent as a Free Action without spending the item from your inventory (it creates a copy).

classes.name: Cultist
classes.description: A thief of secrets and souls. You infiltrate high society or secure vaults not for gold, but to plant curses and recover forbidden artifacts. You strike from the shadows, weakening your prey with dark magic before delivering a mercy kill.

synergy_feats.name: Whispered Hex
synergy_feats.effect: You weave a spell with zero trace. Cast an Occultist Spell that targets a single creature. This casting is Subtle (no sound/gestures). If you are Hidden, you remain Hidden after casting. The target has Disadvantage on any Saving Throw made to resist the spell.

synergy_feats.name: Traitor's Luck
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An enemy within 30 feet succeeds on an Attack Check or Saving Throw. Effect: You twist fate, forcing them to Re-roll the check and use the new result. If the re-roll results in a Failure, the enemy takes 2d6 Psychic Damage from the backlash.

synergy_feats.name: Ritual of the Black Knife
synergy_feats.effect: You perform a sacred assassination. Make a Melee Attack. If the target is Flanked, Surprised, or suffering from a Negative Condition (e.g., Hexed, Blinded), this attack becomes an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). It deals Critical Weapon Damage plus 5d10 Necrotic Damage. If this kills the target, you regain 1d4 Mana Points.

classes.name: Grave Robber
classes.description: A grim survivalist of the crypts. You do not fear the curse or the trap; you weaponize them. You combine dirty fighting with forbidden magic to bind enemies and harvest power from the dead.

synergy_feats.name: Dead Man's Snare
synergy_feats.effect: You infuse a physical trap with a necrotic hex. Consume 1 Trap Reagent (e.g., Snare, Caltrops). Deploy it as per the item's rules. When triggered, the target suffers the physical effect AND must make a Will Save against your Casting Check. On a failure, they are Cursed for 1 minute. While Cursed, they cannot regain HP and take 1d6 Necrotic Damage every time they move or attempt to escape the trap.

synergy_feats.name: Grave-Sight
synergy_feats.effect: You attune your senses to death for 10 minutes. 1. Spirit Vision: You can see Invisible and Ethereal creatures/objects. 2. Predator's Eye: You have Advantage on Attack Checks against Undead and any creature below 50% HP. 3. Loot Sense: You automatically sense the direction of the most valuable object within 60 feet.

synergy_feats.name: Exhume the Horde
synergy_feats.effect: You call forth vengeful spirits in a 30-foot radius. The area becomes Difficult Terrain. Enemies in the area must make a Reflex Save or be Restrained by spectral hands. At the start of each of your turns, every Restrained enemy takes 3d6 Necrotic Damage. You regain 1 MP for every enemy damaged this way (max 3 MP/turn).

classes.name: Cult Leader
classes.description: A charismatic zealot who has seen the truth. You gather followers through spiritual fervor, driving your allies into a blood-rage while protecting yourself with mind-bending auras.

synergy_feats.name: Fanatical Command
synergy_feats.effect: You drive an ally to violence. Choose one ally within 30 feet. They immediately use their Reaction to make a Weapon Attack. This attack deals an additional +1d6 Psychic Damage. After the attack, the ally gains 1d6 Temporary Hit Points.

synergy_feats.name: Aura of the Idol
synergy_feats.effect: You project a 30-foot aura of terrifying divinity for 1 minute. 1. Enthrall: Enemies starting their turn in the aura must compare their Will Save to your Influence Check. Fail: They are Charmed by you (cannot attack you) until they take damage. 2. Embolden: Allies in the aura deal an additional +1d6 Necrotic Damage on hits.

synergy_feats.name: Rite of Communion
synergy_feats.effect: You link your party to the void. For 1 minute, you and all allies within 60 feet are 'Blessed'. 1. Numbness: Blessed creatures have Resistance to Non-Magical Physical Damage. 2. Vampiric Strike: Once per turn, when a Blessed creature hits an enemy, they regain 1d10 Hit Points.

classes.name: Necromancer
classes.description: An artisan of the macabre. You do not pray to the dead; you build them. You combine galvanic fluids, preservation jars, and necrotic magic to construct undead minions that are faster, stronger, and more volatile.

synergy_feats.name: Volatile Reanimation
synergy_feats.effect: You infuse a corpse with a volatile chemical soul. Consume 1 Damaging Reagent (e.g., Bomb, Acid). Target a corpse within 30 feet. It animates as a Thrall (5 HP, Speed 30). It acts immediately on your turn. When it is reduced to 0 HP, it explodes, dealing 2d6 Damage (Type matches Reagent) to all adjacent creatures.

synergy_feats.name: Galvanic Upgrade
synergy_feats.effect: You reinforce an undead minion with steel and chemistry. Target one Undead you control. Consume 1 Reagent to grant a buff for 1 hour: 1. Scrap: +2 Armor Score. 2. Organics: +15ft Speed and +1d6 Damage. 3. Flora: Regenerates 5 HP at the start of its turn.

synergy_feats.name: The Flesh-Hulk
synergy_feats.effect: You stitch together a titan. Consume 1 Reagent. Summon a Large Flesh-Hulk in an unoccupied space within 30 feet for 1 minute. Stats: 50 HP, Armor Score 2. It makes Two Slam Attacks (2d10 Dmg each). Leaking Aura: Any creature starting its turn adjacent to the Hulk takes 1d10 Damage (Type matches the Reagent).

classes.name: Pilgrim
classes.description: A traveler on a secret holy mission. You use stealth to survive in hostile lands, delivering miracles with a whisper and vanishing before the wicked can strike back.

synergy_feats.name: Silent Prayer
synergy_feats.effect: You invoke a miracle without sound or gesture. Cast a Priest Spell. You gain Advantage on the Casting Check. This casting is Subtle. If you are Hidden, you remain Hidden after casting. If the spell Heals or deals Radiant Damage, add +1d6 to the roll.

synergy_feats.name: Grace Under Fire
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You take damage from an attack or hazard. Effect: Divine luck intervenes. 1. Reduce the damage by Half. 2. You immediately Regain HP equal to the damage you actually took. 3. You may shift 15 feet to an unoccupied space without provoking counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Saint's Fortune
synergy_feats.effect: You walk with destiny for 1 minute. 1. You are Immune to Grappled, Restrained, and Stunned. 2. You have Advantage on ALL Attack and Casting Checks. 3. Divine Evasion: Once per round, if you fail a Defense Check, you can choose to Succeed instead.

classes.name: Exorcist
classes.description: A divine hunter of the unnatural. You know exactly which prayer hurts a poltergeist and which root binds a demon. You use sanctified traps to cage spirits and banish them from the material world.

synergy_feats.name: Sanctified Snare
synergy_feats.effect: You infuse a trap with holy water and scripture. Consume 1 Trap Reagent (e.g., Snare, Caltrops). Deploy it as per the item's rules. When triggered, the target suffers the physical effect AND takes 1d8 Radiant Damage. If the target is an Undead or Fiend, they have Disadvantage on any check to resist or escape the trap.

synergy_feats.name: Rite of the Silver Cage
synergy_feats.effect: You bind a supernatural entity. Target one creature within 30 feet. Make a Scrutiny/Lore Check against their Will Save. Success: The target is Bound for 1 minute. 1. Their Speed becomes 0. 2. They cannot Teleport or Shapeshift. 3. If Incorporeal, they are forced to materialize and lose their damage resistances.

synergy_feats.name: The Purgation Zone
synergy_feats.effect: You create a 30-foot cylinder of absolute purity for 1 minute. 1. Any Undead, Fiend, or Aberration inside takes 3d10 Radiant Damage at the start of their turn (No Save). 2. Allies inside have Resistance to Necrotic Damage and Immunity to Charm/Fear. 3. If an extra-planar creature hits 0 HP inside, it is instantly Banished.

classes.name: Bishop
classes.description: A pillar of the faith who commands respect from the battlefield. You issue edicts that shatter fear, heal the wounded, and inspire your flock to a holy crusade.

synergy_feats.name: Shepherd's Hand
synergy_feats.effect: You pull an ally from the brink. Choose one ally within 30 feet. 1. They immediately regain 1d8 + WIS Modifier HP. 2. They can immediately use their Reaction to Move up to their Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Edict of Absolution
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You or an ally within 30 feet fails a Save against a mental effect (Charm, Fear, Confusion). Effect: You speak a word of authority. The target treats the roll as a Success instead, ending the effect instantly. They gain Advantage on their next Attack Check.

synergy_feats.name: The Grand Crusade
synergy_feats.effect: You declare a holy war. For 1 minute, you and all allies within 60 feet gain: 1. +1d8 Radiant Damage on all weapon attacks. 2. Immunity to Frightened and Stunned. 3. Divine Fortune: A d20 roll of 19 counts as a Critical Hit.

classes.name: Scribe
classes.description: A warrior-scholar who carries the word of their god in ink and oil. You inscribe holy texts onto shields, brew sacred waters, and turn alchemy into a vessel for miracles.

synergy_feats.name: Sanctified Munitions
synergy_feats.effect: You transmute a volatile reagent into holy power. Consume 1 Damaging Reagent (e.g., Bomb, Acid). Throw it using your Priest Casting Check. On Impact: 1. It deals Radiant Damage instead of its normal type. 2. It releases a burst of positive energy; all allies in the blast radius regain 1d6 Hit Points.

synergy_feats.name: Scripture of Warding
synergy_feats.effect: You inscribe a protective prayer on an ally's armor. Consume 1 Reagent (Ink/Chalk). For 1 minute, the ally gains: 1. +1 Armor Score. 2. Resistance to Necrotic Damage. 3. Retribution: When hit by a melee attack, the attacker takes 1d6 Radiant Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Glyph of Judgment
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a cataclysmic rune. Consume 1 Reagent. Create a 30-foot cylinder of light at a point within 60 feet. 1. Enemies take 4d10 Radiant Damage and are Blinded (1 min). Reflex Save for half/no blind. 2. Allies in the area regain 2d10 HP and are cured of all negative conditions.

classes.name: Shadow-Stalker
classes.description: A predator of the twilight. You understand that nature is not just sunlight and growth; it is silence, predation, and death. You do not just hide in the environment; you become it, striking with the sudden, violent finality of a viper.

synergy_feats.name: Mist-Walker's Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You exhale a cloud of obscuring mist. 1. You become Invisible until the end of your turn. 2. You can Move up to your Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks. 3. At the end of the move, make a Melee Attack (with Advantage due to Invisibility). On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Poison Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Form of the Viper
synergy_feats.effect: You transform into a predator of shadow (Snake, Panther, Spider) for 1 minute. 1. Natural Camouflage: You can Hide even while observed if near shadows. 2. Venomous Fangs: Your Unarmed Strike becomes a Finesse weapon (1d8 Damage). If you hit a target from Hiding, they must make a Fortitude Save vs. your Attack Roll or be Paralyzed (Stunned) until the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: The Hunting Grounds
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a primal curse, creating a 30-foot sphere of magical darkness and grasping vines for 1 minute. 1. Panic: Enemies in the zone are Blinded and treat it as Difficult Terrain. 2. Stalker's Sight: You see perfectly in the zone. 3. The Cull: Once per turn, you can Teleport to any space in the zone (Free Action). Your attacks against enemies inside deal +2d6 Precision Damage.

classes.name: Beast Heart
classes.description: A warrior bound to a spirit beast. You fight in perfect unison with your companion, sharing life force, casting spells through its eyes, and evolving its form to suit the battle.

synergy_feats.name: Bond of the Spirit Beast
synergy_feats.effect: Passive: You gain a Spirit Beast (HP: Level x 3, AS: 1, Dmg: 1d6). It is magical and can be resummoned for 2 MP during a rest. Action (1 MP + 1 Luck): Command your beast to attack. It strikes with Advantage. On a Hit, it deals Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Elemental Damage (Fire/Cold/Lightning) and applies a secondary effect (Burn/Slow/Shock).

synergy_feats.name: Evolutionary Surge
synergy_feats.effect: You flood your beast with power for 1 minute. 1. Growth: It becomes Large and can serve as a Mount. 2. Resilience: It gains 1d10 Temp HP. 3. Mutation (Choose One): Wings (Fly 40ft), Iron Hide (+2 AS), or Rending Claws (Damage becomes 2d6).

synergy_feats.name: Soul of the Apex
synergy_feats.effect: You merge consciousness with your beast for 1 minute. 1. Titanic: Beast becomes Huge (Reach +10ft). 2. Power: Beast attacks deal +2d8 Force Damage. 3. Conduit: You can cast Primalist spells originating from the beast's space. 4. Shared Life: You share a single HP pool; healing either heals the pool.

classes.name: Chieftain
classes.description: The spiritual and military head of a clan. You speak with the voice of the thunder, calling down storms to shield your people and imbue them with the strength of the wild.

synergy_feats.name: Storm-Caller's Command
synergy_feats.effect: You shout with the force of a gale. 1. Enemies in a 15-foot cone must make a Fortitude Save vs your Casting Check. Fail: Take 1d6 Thunder Damage and are pushed 5 feet away. 2. Allies in the cone gain +10 feet to their Speed until the end of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Totem of War
synergy_feats.effect: You summon a Totem (HP 10, AS 1) in an unoccupied space within 30 feet. It projects a 15-foot aura for 1 minute. 1. Primal Ward: Allies in the aura have Resistance to Cold, Fire, and Lightning Damage. 2. Savage Inspiration: Once per round, an ally in the aura adds your WIS Modifier to their melee damage.

synergy_feats.name: The Great Storm
synergy_feats.effect: You conjure a 30-foot-radius storm centered on yourself for 1 minute. 1. Fury: At the start of your turn, a lightning bolt strikes one enemy in the storm for 3d8 Lightning Damage (No Save). 2. Wisdom: Allies in the storm have Advantage on all Saving Throws. 3. Guide: Allies ignore Difficult Terrain within the storm.

classes.name: Herbalist
classes.description: A master of the Green Science. You mix mana with moss and turn seeds into bombs. You support your allies with mutagenic potions and control the battlefield with rapid, weaponized overgrowth.

synergy_feats.name: Seed-Bombardment
synergy_feats.effect: You infuse a volatile reagent with surges of growth magic. Consume 1 Damaging or Utility Reagent (e.g., Acid Flask, Tanglefoot Bag). Throw it using your Casting Check. The Reagent's Radius is Doubled. The area becomes Difficult Terrain (thorny vines). Creatures in the area take 1d6 Poison Damage in addition to the Reagent's standard effect.

synergy_feats.name: Infusion of the Titan
synergy_feats.effect: You brew a potent mutagen on the fly. Consume 1 Restorative Reagent (e.g., Healing Salve, Stone-Skin). Touch a willing creature. They receive the Reagent's effect with all variable numbers Maximized. Additionally, they physically mutate for 1 minute: they gain +1 Armor Score (Barkskin) and have Advantage on all Strength Checks.

synergy_feats.name: The Genesis Bloom
synergy_feats.effect: You plant a seed containing absolute life force. Consume 1 Reagent. A Large magical flower erupts in an unoccupied space within 30 feet, lasting for 1 minute. It projects a 30-foot aura. 1. Allies starting their turn in the aura regain 1d10 HP and are cured of Poison. 2. Enemies starting their turn in the aura must make a Fortitude Save or take 3d8 Poison Damage and be Blinded.
